column12: Cloud system and method for integrating a cloud system
column13: A local server can cooperate with a version control storage server, and a cloud service platform to form a cloud system. The local server includes a building tester. The building tester executes a predetermined building script to obtain a program code to be tested from the version control storage server, upload the program code to a testing bucket of the cloud service platform, remove a plurality of service items provided by the cloud service platform, activate a plurality of service items to be tested on the cloud service platform according to the program code for building an application environment, and perform the test in the application environment. The service items provided by the cloud service platform includes application function services and database services.

column12: Search method and mobile device using the same
Method and System for Determining and Reclassifying Valuable Words
column13: Method and system for determining and reclassifying valuable words, wherein a large amount of text and valuable words are pre-inputted into a word processing server for machine learning. Moreover, the word processing server is trained on the valuable words and many labels associated with the valuable words such that it can learn and determines the valuable words in the text that meet the definition of the valuable word. The valuable word is further extracted from the text and re-classified after extraction. In addition, each valuable word is provided with various relevance labels to facilitate the subsequent application of the valuable words.

column12: Intermediary system for lending consumption based on blockchain and method thereof
column13: An intermediary system for lending consumption based on blockchain and method thereof is disclosed. By creating a blockchain network and generating a wallet address of an intermediary end, a lending end, a borrowing end and a business end, and depositing a default number of cryptocurrencies within the blockchain network directly into the wallet address of the intermediary end. When borrowing and paying, after confirmed a cash flow of a lend cash and an order amount through the intermediary end, executing blockchain transactions for sending the cryptocurrencies according to the cash flow to form a transaction data flow, so as to provide tracing and double checking. The mechanism helps to improve the safety and reliability of the lending consumption.

column12: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR OPTIMIZING RACK SERVER RESOURCES
column13: A system and method for distributing tasks between computing devices in a rack. Each of the computing devices have hardware resources and is coupled to a management network. A rack management controller monitors the utilization of hardware resources by each of the computing devices. The rack management controller allocates performance of tasks, such as operating virtual machines, to some of the computing devices to maximize computing devices with substantially full hardware resource utilization. The rack management controller minimizes the allocation of tasks to computing devices with less than full hardware resource utilization. The rack management controller commands any idle computing devices to minimize power consumption.

column12: Method and apparatus for detecting word boundary
column13: A word boundary detection method includes receiving a data stream from a data channel of a high definition multimedia interface (HDMI), and performing pattern matching upon the data stream to identify a word boundary between two consecutive codewords transmitted via the data stream. Known codewords of scrambled control vectors are involved in the pattern matching.

column12: Computer implemented food safety related management method
column13: A food safety related management method includes: allowing a terminal to access an authenticated account; receiving reported data in relation to a defective food product from the terminal; searching a database for piece(s) of highly related data each related to a defective food product and each with a purchase time within a time interval that is defined based on the reported data; searching the piece(s) of highly related data for one(s) with overlapping issues of concern and identical merchant information with the reported data; creating a communication group for communication among accounts used to upload the reported data and said one(s) of the piece(s) of highly related data; and inserting the reported data into the database.

column12: Driving assistance method and vehicle
column13: The invention provides a driving assistance method which is applied to a vehicle and comprises the steps that a database is established, keywords are pre-stored in the database, and the keywords are defined as words related to traffic; an electronic text of traffic regulations is obtained; keywords in the electronic text are extracted according to the database; a trigger condition is generated according to the extracted keyword; current driving parameters of the vehicle are obtained, and when the current driving parameters meet the triggering conditions, an auxiliary driving instruction is sent out. The invention further provides a vehicle.

column12: ABNORMAL TRAFFIC DETECTION METHOD AND ABNORMAL TRAFFIC DETECTION DEVICE
column13: An abnormal traffic detection method is provided according to an embodiment of the disclosure. The method includes: obtaining network traffic data (21, 22, 31, 81) of a target device (12); sampling the network traffic data (21, 22, 31, 81) by a sampling window (301, 302, 303) with a time length to obtain sampling data (401, 402, 403, 411, 412, 413, 51, 52, 801(1), 801(2), 801(3), 802(1), 802(2), 802(3), 802(4), 803(1)); generating, according to the sampling data (401, 402, 403, 411, 412, 413, 51, 52, 801(1), 801(2), 801(3), 802(1), 802(2), 802(3), 802(4), 803(1)), an image (71) which presents a traffic feature of the network traffic data (21, 22, 31, 81) corresponding to the time length; and analyzing the image (71) to generate evaluation information (91) corresponding to an abnormal traffic. In addition, an abnormal traffic detection device (10) is also provided.

column12: LINEAR MOTION SYSTEM
TW I666619 B
Internet of Vehicles system and method for dynamically labeling risk area
column13: The invention provides an Internet of Vehicles system and method for dynamically marking a risk area, and the Internet of Vehicles system comprises a cloud server which is used for communicating witha vehicle system. The cloud server comprises a communication module, a planning module, an operation module and a judgment module. The communication module is used for receiving vehicle information from a vehicle system, wherein the vehicle information comprises a vehicle position. The planning module is used for formulating a dynamic risk area range according to the vehicle position. The dynamicrisk area range moves synchronously along with the vehicle position. The operation module is used for calculating a risk factor coefficient corresponding to the vehicle information and calculating risk intensity corresponding to the dynamic risk area range. The judgment module is used for judging whether the risk intensity is greater than or equal to a preset threshold. And the communication module informs a warning that the risk intensity of the dynamic risk area range of the vehicle system is greater than a preset threshold.
column14: INVENTEC APPLIANCES SHANGHAI;;INVENTEC APPLIANCES SHANGHAI CORP;;INVENTEC APPLIANCES CORP

column12: Method of identifying potential dangerous road and information sharing, cloud server, computer-readable medium and application-specific integrated circuit
column13: A method of identifying potential dangerous road and information sharing, it classifies the government published dangerous roads into a plural of road-type groups, and divides the roads in the electronic map except for the government published dangerous roads into a plural of road sections, and classifies the road sections into the said road-type groups. Then it collects On Board data of every road section in every road-type group, and calculates a contrast data of the government published dangerous roads and a drive behavior feature data of every road section in every road-type group according to the On Board data, and it determines whether each road section that corresponds to each drive behavior feature data is a potential dangerous road section according to a similarity between each drive behavior feature data and the contrast data, and updates the government published dangerous roads and the determined potential dangerous road sections in the electronic map.

column12: Method and system for preventing shutdown and BIOS (Basic Input/Output System) chip
column13: In a computer system, a system and method for preventing a watchdog from shutting down after timeout begins. A start-up routine (start-up routine) is started up via a basic input/output system (basic input/output system; and a BIOS (Basic Input/Output System). And starting the setting of hardware elements for routine application. A watchdog timer (watch dog timer) may be determined whether to trigger a restart upon timeout during execution of a previous boot routine. If the watchdog timer triggers a restart, the system checks a database storing settings for each of the plurality of hardware elements to obtain appropriate settings for the hardware elements. The system applies settings for hardware elements from a database.

column12: DATA STORAGE DEVICE WITH SYSTEM OPERATION CAPABILITY
column13: A data storage device is disclosed. The data storage device comprises a data storage unit, a data transmission interface, and a microprocessor. The data transmission interface is connected to the data storage unit via a switch. The microprocessor is connected to an input and output device, and connected to the data storage unit via the switch. The microprocessor is configured with an embedded system. When a connection between the data transmission interface and the data storage unit is conducted via the switch, a host is able to read data from or write to the data storage unit via the data transmission interface. Otherwise, when a connection between the microprocessor and the data storage unit is conducted via the switch, the embedded system of the microprocessor can execute an input and output process between the input and output device and the data storage unit.

column12: MANAGEMENT SYSTEM FOR ASSET DYNAMIC VALUE BASED ON BLOCKCHAIN AND METHOD THEREOF
column13: A management system for asset dynamic value based on blockchain and a method thereof are disclosed. In the management system, an asset management host, an asset holding host and a transaction object host serving as nodes on a blockchain network are provided; the asset management host creates a smart contract associated with an asset to record statuses of funds, holdings and sub-assets; the asset holding host and the transaction object host are permitted to execute functions in the smart contract, so as to perform the transfer between the funds and the holdings and store the sub-assets in the smart contract. Therefore, the technical effect of improving convenience and credibility in dynamic management of asset value can be achieved.

column12: Data storage apparatus and data prediction method thereof
column13: A data storage apparatus and a data prediction method thereof are provided. The data storage apparatus includes a memory unit and a prediction unit. The prediction unit acquires a plurality of accesslocation data of a plurality of data access actions of a prior access history of the memory unit. The prediction unit analyzes the prior access history of the memory unit. The prediction unit performsa quantification process on the access location data to acquire a plurality of quantized data corresponding to the prior access history. The prediction unit predicts a data pre-accessing target of the memory unit according to the quantized data. Therefore, the data storage apparatus and the data prediction method thereof can predict the data pre-accessing target of the memory unit.

column12: PORTABLE CLOUD COMPUTING AUTO-DIAGNOSIS CERVICAL VERTEBRA TRACTOR
CLOUD-BASED TRANSACTION SYSTEM AND METHOD CAPABLE OF PROVIDING NEURAL NETWORK TRAINING MODEL IN SUPERVISED STATE
column13: In a cloud system for providing an artificial neural network training model under surveillance and a method thereof, a plurality of data is trained mainly by using different training programs to obtain different training models, a user terminal can remotely conduct a transaction through a third-party transaction platform, and different training models are downloaded according to the transaction result under surveillance of a monitoring unit so that the user terminal compares differences in accuracy between the different training models to improve the accuracy of the training models. The cloud system for providing an artificial neural network training model under surveillance comprises: a storage unit; a monitoring unit; a transaction port; and a connection port.
column15: HUANG TZUNG CHI;;LIAO KEN YING KAI;;TSAI FUU JEN

column12: Illumination method with multispectral rhythm illumination situation
column13: The invention discloses a lighting method with a multispectral rhythm lighting situation. The lighting method comprises the following steps: downloading a multispectral rhythm lighting situation database from a cloud end; a multispectral illumination parameter and a rhythm parameter are selected from the multispectral rhythm illumination situation database to start a light-emitting device for illumination; irradiating the illuminated person with light by a light-emitting device; after the blood or saliva of the illuminated person is examined, obtaining a psychological stress index value of the illuminated person; transmitting the rhythm parameter and the psychological stress index value to a cloud by the portable communication device; wherein the rhythm parameters comprise rhythm irradiation parameters and rhythm situation parameters.
column14: BRITISH CAYMAN ISLANDS SHANGDAXIAGU SMART LIGHTING SYSTEMS CO LTD;;LIN JILIANG

column12: PROGRESSIVE GLOBAL POSITIONING SYSTEM AND METHOD
column13: A progressive global positioning system and a progressive global positioning method, which are specifically a system and method for establishing a global positioning service of a large number of available wireless communication nodes having a "location learning capability". Each communication node (N0, N1) obtains the geographic coordinates thereof by acquiring location information from neighboring communication nodes. By performing distance measurement multiple times and implementing an accurate index scoring mode, each communication node (N0, N1) can continuously maintain the geographic coordinates thereof, and gradually improve the accuracy over time.

column12: Method for facilitating recovery from crash of solid-state storage device, method of data synchronization, computer system, and solid-state storage device
column13: A method for facilitating recovery from a crash of a solid-state storage device (SSD) is adapted to be implemented by an SSD controller of the SSD that receives a write request. The method includes: assigning a write request identifier (WID) and a request size in a spare area of each written page of the SSD; counting a number of appearances of the WID in all written page(s) to result in a WID count; determining whether the WID count is equal to the request size; and determining that the write request is completed and is eligible for recovery after a crash of the SSD when it is determined that the WID count is equal to the request size.

column12: Carbon coin trading system and its method
column13: 본 발명은 탄소 코인 거래의 시스템 및 이의 방법을 제공한다. 상기 시스템은 적어도 하나의 설비에 연결된 인증 장치, 적어도 하나의 엔티티 탄소 코인 및 거래 관리 호스트로 구성된다. 상기 인증 장치의 검출 모듈을 이용해 설비의 에너지 소비 데이터를 감지하고, 엔티티 탄소 코인의 탄소량 계산 모듈은 설비의 에너지 소비 데이터에 따라 제1 탄소 배출량을 계산하여, 상기 거래 관리 호스트에 업로드한다. 상기 거래 관리 호스트는 선고 계산 모듈을 통해 대체 선고를 더 획득하며, 상기 선고 계산 모듈은 대체 선고에 따라 제2 탄소 배출량을 계산한다. 또한 획득 가능한 유가 디지털 코인을 더 계산하여 탄소 코인 거래 이벤트를 생성 및 기록한다.

column12: Bicycle product data analysis system and method thereof
column13: A bicycle product data analysis system includes a quality module, an analysis module, an assessment module, a graphic integration module, and a diagnose module. The quality module enters an analysis standard information. The analysis module receives a specification information, and analyzes the analysis standard information and the specification information into a quality characteristic. The assessment module, based on such information, generates an assessment coordinates and an information detection coordinates. The graphic integration module produces a capability assessment diagram which is transformed into a standard capability scope. The graphic integration module integrates the information detection coordinates in the capability assessment diagram. The diagnose module determines if the information detection coordinates fall in the standard capability scope, thus generating an improvement information which is sent back to the terminal device. Therefore, a basis for process improvement is acquired.

column12: PASSIVE MEDICAL DATA EXCHANGING CLOUD SYSTEM AND METHOD
METHOD FOR AUTHENTICATION AND AUTHORIZATION AND AUTHENTICATION SERVER USING THE SAME
column13: The disclosure provides a method for authentication and authorization and an authentication server using the same method. The method includes: receiving login information from application; in responseto authenticating the login information is valid, generating a user token and sending the user token to the application; receiving a request of the application for invoking an application programminginterface (API), wherein the request includes the user token, an identity of the application, and a key of the application; in response to authenticating the user token, the identity, and the key arevalid, generating an application token related to the application and sending the application token to the application to authorize the application to invoke the API.

column12: Data storage device, electronic apparatus, and system capable of remotely controlling electronic apparatus
column13: The invention provides a system capable of remotely controlling electronic apparatus, which comprises a cloud management platform and at least one electronic apparatus. The electronic apparatus comprises a data storage device having network communication function and at least one operation element. The data storage device comprises a first transmission interface, a second transmission interface, a data storage unit, and an operation management unit. Data stored in the data storage unit can be read or data can be written into the data storage unit via the first transmission interface. When the operation management unit of the data storage device receives a specific operation instruction sent by the cloud management platform, it will transmit the specific operation instruction to the operation element through the second transmission interface, so that the operation element performs the corresponding operation according to the specific operation instruction.

column12: MULTIMEDIA PROCESSING METHOD AND ELECTRONIC SYSTEM
column13: An electronic system is provided. The electronic system includes a host, an audio output device and a display. The host includes an audio processing module, a relay processing module, a smart interpreter engine and a driver. The audio processing module is utilized for acquiring audio data corresponding to a first language from audio streams processed by an application program executed on the host. The smart interpreter engine is utilized for converting the audio data corresponding to the first language into text data corresponding to a second language. The relay processing module is utilized for transmitting the text data corresponding to the second language to the display for displaying. The driver is utilized for converting the data corresponding to the first language into an analog audio signal corresponding to the first language and transmitting the analog audio signal corresponding to the first language to the audio output device for playback.

column12: Least decentralized fund trading system and method thereof
Color image authentication method based on palette compression technique
column13: An image authentication method is provided. An original image is divided into blocks. An interpolation algorithm is performed on each block so as to obtain a first image. Each pixel in the first image is mapped into an index based on a palette compression technique, so as to generate a second image. Each index is divided into multiple secret values, and a secret sharing algorithm is performed based on the secret values to obtain multiple partial shares. A transparent map is generated according to the partial shares, and a lossless image filed is generated by combining the original image with the transparent map.

column12: METHOD, SERVER, NON-TRANSITORY COMPUTER-READABLE STORAGE MEDIUM AND APPLICATION SPECIFIC INTEGRATED CIRCUIT FOR IDENTIFYING DANGEROUS ROAD SECTIONS
column13: A method for identifying dangerous roads includes: receiving a vehicle dataset and extracting a driving record associated with a travelled road section therefrom; for a road section belonging to one of a plurality of section categories, obtaining a driving record from the vehicle dataset; calculating a driving characteristic dataset based on the driving records that are associated with an identified road section; and determining, whether the identified road section should be deemed as a potential dangerous road section based on at least the driving characteristic dataset and a corresponding one of a plurality of reference datasets that corresponds to one of the plurality of section categories.

column12: 覆盖管理方法、计算系统及非易失性计算机可读存储介质
column13: 本发明提供一种覆盖管理方法、覆盖管理系统及计算系统，阐述用于使用机器学习来管理半导体制造中的垂直对齐或覆盖的技术。通过所公开的技术来评估及管理扇出型晶片级封装工艺中内连特征的对齐。使用大数据及神经网络系统来使覆盖误差源因子与覆盖计量类别相关。所述覆盖误差源因子包括工具相关覆盖源因子、晶片或管芯相关覆盖源因子、以及处理上下文相关覆盖误差源因子。

column12: Gas detecting device
column13: A gas detecting device is disclosed and comprises a casing, at least one gas transmitting actuator, at least one valve and at least one detachable sensing device, wherein the casing comprises a ventilation chamber, at least one air inlet, at least one branch flow passage and at least one connecting passage, the ventilation chamber is in communication with the outside of the casing through the air inlet, the branch flow passage is in communication with the ventilation chamber, and the connecting passage is in communication with the branch flow passage, the gas transmitting actuator is disposed within the branch flow passage and comprises an air-jetting-hole plate, a chamber frame, a piezoelectric actuator, an insulating frame and a conductive frame, and the gas transmitting actuator is actuated for directing the air flow to flow into the ventilation chamber and the branch flow passage through the air inlet, the valve is disposed between the connecting flow passage and the branch flow passage for controlling the air to be directed to the connecting passage, the detachable sensing device is detachably disposed within the connecting passage and comprises a sensor used for sensing the air in the connecting passing.

column12: TW I774522 B
Computer and automatic protection method
column13: A computer and an automatic protection method thereof are provided. The automatic protection method includes the following steps. A sound receiving unit of the computer receives a sound signal. Whether a fan error event is occurred is determined according to the sound signal. If the fan error event is occurred, a first data protection procedure is performed. Whether a disaster event is occurred is determined according to the sound signal. If the disaster event is occurred, a second data protection procedure is performed. Whether the computer is at a locking status is determined. If the computer is at the locking status, whether a data security hazard event is occurred is determined according to the sound signal. If the data security hazard event is occurred, a third data protection procedure is performed.

column12: NETWORK DEVICE, IMAGE PROCESSING METHOD, AND COMPUTER READABLE MEDIUM
column13: The disclosure provides a network device, an image processing method, and a computer readable medium. The method includes: receiving a video stream from an IP camera; detecting whether a predetermined motion event occurs in the video stream according to a designated motion detection mode; in response to the predetermined motion event is detected, generating an event mark corresponding to the predetermined motion event and extracting a video clip corresponding to the predetermined motion event from the video stream; determining whether a video content satisfying a notification condition exists in the video clip; and in response to the video content satisfying the notification condition, sending the event mark and the video content to a smart device accessing the network device.

column12: Estimable proof-of-work for blockchain
column13: A method for calculating a number of proof-of-work to measure how much work has been done in one block mining, includes the following steps: using a low hash, wherein the low hash value corresponding to a low nonce is not greater than a predetermined target value; using a high hash, wherein the high hash value corresponding to a high nonce is higher than the same target value; and calculating the number of proof-of-work according to the low hash value and the high hash value. The low hash value is the lowest hash value in one block mining. The high hash value is the highest hash value in the same block mining.
column32: Ozisik, Pinar et al. “Estimation of Miner Hash Rates and Concensus on Blockchains.” Jul. 1, 2017. pp. 1-13.

column12: Image capturing device, storage space adjusting method and computer readable recording medium
column13: The invention discloses an image capturing device, a storage space adjusting method thereof and a non-instantaneous computer readable recording medium. The storage space adjusting method is suitable for an image capturing device with a display screen, and comprises the following steps: detecting the size of the storage space of the image capturing device in the image capturing operation process ofthe image capturing device; in response to the insufficient storage space, presenting a space adjustment option for adjusting the storage space through the display screen; and maintaining the operation of the image capture job in response to a selection operation of the spatial adjustment option. Therefore, the currently executed photographing or video recording operation cannot be interrupted suddenly, so that the use experience is improved.

column12: System and method capable of transmitting data into blockchain
column13: The invention provides a system for transmitting data into a blockchain, which comprises a data storage device and an electronic device. The data storage device comprises a controller, plurality of flash memories, and a data storage interface. The electronic device comprises a processor and a network communication element. The controller calculates a specific data stored in the flash memories by a hash algorithm program to obtain a hash data corresponding to the specific data, and transmits the hash data to the electronic device. The processor of the electronic device uploads the hash data to the blockchain by a chaining program to chain the hash data into the blockchain. Accordingly, the system chains the hash data corresponding to the specific data into the blockchain to ensure the security of the specific data in use.

column12: CONTROL DEVICE AND METHOD FOR IMAGE DISPLAY
column13: A control device and a method for image display are provided. The control device includes a mirror display unit, a backward camera unit, a reference data detection module, and an image processing module. The mirror display unit includes a mirror and a display module. The mirror generates a first image via reflection. The display module has a display surface at least partially overlapping with the mirror. The backward camera unit captures a second image, and the area of the first image is within the area of the second image. The reference data detection module generates reference data. The image processing module determines an area correspondence between the first image and the second image according to the reference data, and generates a display image from the second image based on the area correspondence. The display module displays the display image when receiving a switch command.

column12: DATA TRANSMITTING METHOD OF DISPLAY DEVICE
column13: A data transmitting method of a display device, which applies to a transmitting device and the display device. The transmitting device includes a first transmitting module. The display device includes a processing module, a second transmitting module, a storage module, and a display module. The data transmission method includes steps of: select a file on the transmitting device; compress the file to form a compressed file; send the compressed file to the display device via the first transmitting module; receive the compressed file by the second transmitting module of the display device; decompress the compressed file by the processing module to obtain the file; write the file into the storage module by the processing module and correspondingly displaying on the display module based on the file. In this way, a time for transmitting the file could be effectively reduced.

column12: NETWORK SERVICE SYSTEM AND NETWORK SERVICE METHOD
Delay adjustment method and data stream processing device
column13: The delay adjustment method comprises the following operations: in response to a preset event occurring in a data stream in a first period, executing a transmission state determination operation to determine whether the transmission state of the data stream is stable; in response to the stable transmission state, determining whether the total number of packet loss compensation events of the data stream in a previous period is higher than a first preset value; and increasing the delay time of the data stream in response to the unstable transmission state or in response to the total number of times exceeding the first preset value.

column12: METHOD OF DELEGATING DATA EDITING AUTHORITY OF PRODUCT ITEMS
column13: A method of delegating data editing authority of product items is provided, which includes the steps of: selecting a plurality of product items in a database in a data management system, which is done by a first party, and then defining the plurality of product items as a plurality of authorized items; generating an authorization code corresponding to the authorized items, and generating a notification message corresponding to the authorization code; a second party responds to the notification message through the electronic device; obtaining the authorized items from the database according to the authorization code corresponding to the notification message responded by the second party, and then transferring the authorized items to the electronic device so as to revise the content of the authorized items. Thereby, the transmission of data is more convenient.

column12: MUSIC SHARING METHOD AND SYSTEM
column13: A music sharing method and system is disclosed, for quickly searching for a specific song and related information through the music recognition technology, and applying the cloud push technology to share the uploaded specific song and related information to a specific member of the group member sharing platform. Furthermore, the invention enables a user to share the uploaded specific songs and related information to specific members of the group member sharing platform within the preset range. Moreover, the invention can recommend songs according to the requirements of the user through the cloud push technology. Moreover, the invention can provide product information suitable for the user through the cloud push technology. Moreover, the invention can understand the ranking of all songs through the cloud push technology, and know that the preferences of the user and all members in sharing certain categories of songs.

column12: COLLABORATIVE CONTROL SYSTEM FOR VEHICLE
column13: To continuously receive instantaneous traffic data by an edge computing device and activate a collaboration device to display the instantaneous traffic data.SOLUTION: A cooperative control system includes: a cloud server 10; a collaboration device 30; and an edge computing device 20. The cloud server 10 stores road coordinates and traffic data corresponding to the road coordinates. The collaboration device 30 is configured to be mounted on a vehicle. The edge computing device 20 is configured to communicate with the cloud server 10 and the collaboration device 30 and be attached to the vehicle. The edge computing device 20 downloads one of traffic data as instant traffic data from the cloud server 10 according to vehicle positioning coordinates corresponding to one of the road coordinates, and transmits the instant traffic data to the collaboration device 30. The collaboration device 30 displays the instant traffic data.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 1

column12: METHOD OF RECORDING TRANSACTIONS BASED ON BLOCKCHAIN AND ELECTRONIC DEVICE USING THE SAME
column13: A method of recording transactions of recording trades based on blockchain and implemented in a server causes the server to receive transactions sent by a terminal device, and extract a transaction category, an associated account number, and a transaction status from the transactions. When the transaction is a currency transfer, the server accesses a trading pool and/or a blockchain through a chain node. When target transactions are filtered out from the trading pool and/or the blockchain, the server calculates results of the target transactions and determines whether the transactions are correct, marks the transaction status of correct transactions as a pending chain status, and sends the marked transactions to the terminal device for confirmation. When receiving transaction information as to a successful transaction, the server marks the transaction status of the transactions as confirmed status, packages the transactions into blocks, and transmits the blocks to the blockchain.

column12: Method and Apparatus of Patch Segmentation for Video-based Point Cloud Coding
column13: Methods and apparatus of video coding for 3D video data are disclosed. According to one method, the gradients of the geometry frame are derived. A reconstructed point cloud is reconstructed using the geometry frame. One or more candidate holes in the reconstructed point cloud are filled based on the gradients of the geometry frame. According to another method of encoding for 3D video data, candidate hole locations in a geometry frame, patch or layer are determined. Source points projected to the candidate hole locations are grouped to generate grouped points. The grouped points are removed from an original patch containing the grouped points.

column12: POWER DEVICE WITH SELF-HEALTH STATUS PREDICTION FUNCTION AND SELF-HEALTH STATUS PREDICTION METHOD THEREOF AND CLOUD SERVER SUITABLE FOR A PLURALITY OF POWER DEVICES
column13: A power device with self-health status prediction function and a self-health status prediction method thereof and a cloud server suitable for a plurality of power devices are provided. The power device is configured to obtain a health index prediction model and a health prediction index threshold of the power device from the cloud server through a communication module thereof, and is configured to put a plurality of obtained sensing data and basic information of the power device into the health index prediction model to obtain a health prediction index. The power device is also configured to obtain a health status prediction data of the power device according to a comparison result between the health prediction index and the health prediction index threshold, so as to perform a follow-up process. Wherein the health index prediction model is constructed and trained by the cloud server by way of machine learning.

column12: Multimedia streaming and network apparatus and operation method of the same
column13: A multimedia streaming and network apparatus is provided that includes a router module, a storage module and a processing module. The processing module executes the application program in the storage module to perform the multimedia streaming and network apparatus operation method that includes the steps outlined below. A first streaming request packet corresponding to a physical STB (set-top box) is received through a LAN port. A multicast hardware offload function of the router module corresponding to the LAN port is activated. A STB (set-top box) virtual machine is operated to perform a STB function. A second streaming request packet corresponding to the STB virtual machine is received. A multicast hardware offload function of the router module corresponding to the processing module port is activated. At least a video stream from a remote server is transmitted by the router module through the LAN port and the processing module port respectively to the physical STB and the STB virtual machine and is processed and playback thereby.

column12: GAS DETECTING DEVICE
column13: A gas detecting device (100) includes a casing (1), at least one gas transporting actuator (2), at least one valve (3) and at least one external sensor (4). The casing (1) has an airflow chamber (11), an inlet (12), a branch channel (13) and a connection channel (14). The airflow chamber (11) communicates with the exterior of the casing (1) through the inlet (12), and the branch channel (13) communicates with the airflow chamber (11) and the connection channel (14). The gas transporting actuator (2) is disposed within the branch channel (13) for transporting air into the airflow chamber (11) and the branch channel (13) from the inlet (12). The valve (3) is disposed between the connection channel (14) and the branch channel (13) for controlling the air to flow into the connection channel (14). The external sensor (4) is detachably disposed within the connection channel (14) and has a sensor for measuring the air in the connection channel (14).

column12: COMPUTER INPUT SYSTEM AND INPUT METHOD WITH FUNCTION OF DISTRIBUTING COMPUTATION
column13: A computer input system with distributing computation function is provided. The computer input system includes a first electronic device, a second electronic device and a mouse. The computation executed by the mouse includes a first computation and a second computation. The mouse executes the first computation and transmits the second computation to the second electronic device, so that the secondelectronic device can execute the second computation.

column12: Singing assisting system, singing assisting method, and non-transitory computer-readable medium comprising instructions for executing the same
column13: A singing assisting system, a singing assisting method, and a non-transitory computer-readable medium including instructions for executing the method are provided. The singing assisting method comprises: receiving a performed singing track by a sound receiving device; detecting if the performed singing track appears in an ought-to-be-performed period by a processing device, if not, executing a singing-continuing procedure, wherein the singing-continuing procedure comprises: converting an original-singer sound segment into an original-singer acoustics feature; inputting the original-singer acoustics feature to the encoder of the original-singer acoustics model; receiving an output of the encoder of the original-singer acoustics model by the decoder of the user acoustics model; obtaining a first user acoustics feature from an output of the decoder of the user acoustics model; and converting the first user acoustics feature into a synthesized singing track by a vocoder; and outputting the synthesized singing track by a player device. The singing-continuing sound generated by the singing-continuing procedure can maintain the intonation of the original singing, and the singing-continuing sound can be the same as the timbre of the user.

column12: Method and system for analyzing skin texture and skin lesion using artificial intelligence cloud based platform
column13: A method and a system for analyzing skin texture and skin lesion using artificial intelligence cloud based platform are provided. The system includes an electronic device and a server. The server includes a storage device and a processor. The processor is coupled to the storage device, accesses and executes a plurality of modules stored in the storage device, the plurality of modules comprising: an information receiving module, receiving a captured image and a plurality of user parameters; a feature vector obtaining module, obtaining the first feature vector from the captured image, and the second feature vector from the plurality of user parameters; a skin parameter acquisition module, obtaining the output result of skin parameters from the first feature vector and the second feature vector; and a skin identification module, determining a skin identification result based on the output result of skin parameters.

column12: Cloud device, terminal device and image classification method
column13: The invention provides a terminal device, and the terminal device is used for classifying images and communicates with a cloud device. The terminal device comprises a processor suitable for realizingeach instruction; a storage device, wherein an image classification model is stored in the storage device, the image classification model comprises operation of a first part and operation of a secondpart, the storage device is further suitable for storing a plurality of instructions, and the instructions are suitable for being loaded by the processor and executing the following steps that an image to be classified is read; sending an image classification instruction to the cloud device; when the instruction comprises the image, receiving an intermediate operation result sent by the cloud device; executing the operation of the second part to obtain a classification result of the image; when the instruction comprises the intermediate operation result, receiving a classification result of the image sent by the cloud device after the instruction is sent. The invention further provides a cloud device and an image classification method.
column14: FUTAIHUA IND SHENZHEN CO LTD;;HON HAI PREC IND CO LTD

column12: Device identification code distribution method and device, and Internet-of-things equipment
column13: The invention provides a device identification code distribution method, which is applied to any blockchain node of a blockchain network, and at least one set of Internet-of-things equipment establishes a communication connection with any blockchain node in the blockchain network. The device identification code distribution method comprises the following steps: acquiring a public key and device information of the Internet-of-things equipment sent by the at least one set of Internet-of-things equipment; generating a group of random codes, and generating a group of equipment identification codesaccording to the public key and the equipment information of the Internet-of-things equipment in combination with the random codes; and sending the device identification code to the Internet-of-things equipment, and writing the device identification code and a public key of the Internet-of-things equipment into the blockchain network in pairs. The invention also provides an equipment identification code distribution device and Internet-of-things equipment. According to the invention, the globally unique device identification code allocated by the blockchain network is obtained through the Internet-of-things equipment, the cost is saved, the production efficiency is improved, the uniqueness of the device identification code can be ensured, and tampering by others is prevented.
column14: FUTAIHUA IND SHENZHEN CO LTD;;HON HAI PREC IND CO LTD
column32: ON THE DESIGN OF A BLOCKCHAIN PLATFORM FOR CLINICAL TRIAL AND PR: ""On the design of a blockchain platform for clinical trial and precision medicine"", 《2017 IEEE 37TH INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON DISTRIBUTED COMPUTING SYSTEMS (ICDCS)》;;肖清旺等: "物联网智能终端设备识别方法", 《电信科学》

column12: Knowledge graph generating apparatus, method, and computer program product thereof
column13: A knowledge graph generating apparatus, method and non-transitory computer readable storage medium thereof are provided. The apparatus marks an entity-relationship of the template of goods informationin the template of webpage according to the operating signal and generates an extraction rule set, wherein the template of webpage is one of multiple goods webpages and has a template format. The apparatus extracts a plurality of first product information of the first goods webpages according to the extraction rule set, wherein the first goods webpages have the template format and are selected from the goods webpages. The apparatus generates a classified goods information result through a product information classification model, wherein the product information classification model is generated based on the first product information and the entity-relationship of the template of goods information. The apparatus converts the classified goods information result into several semantic triplesto generate a knowledge graph.
column15: KUO HSIN YI;;YANG YOU CYUAN;;HUANG WEN FA;;WANG WEN NAN;;CHEN PING I

column12: Decentralized financial investment system based on blockchain including a risk investment end computer device, a stable income end computer device, a quantitative trading follow-up investment platform and a smart contract
column13: The present invention is a decentralized financial investment system based on blockchain, which includes a risk investment end computer device, which allows risk-loving users to execute high-leverage risk transactions; a stable income end computer device, which allows a fixed income holder to execute transactions for receiving interest every month; a quantitative trading follow-up investment platform, which stores a selected investment strategy program, which is used to execute high-leverage risk transactions; and a smart contract, which further includes a risk collateral module and an investment interest exchange contract module. The risk collateral module stores the currencies subscribed by the risk-loving users and the fixed income holders. The investment interest exchange contract module stores investment interest exchange contract rule data. The smart contract executes capital gains distribution of the currency stored in the risk collateral module according to the investment interest exchange contract rule data.

column12: PROGRESSIVE GLOBAL POSITIONING SYSTEM AND METHOD THEREOF
column13: A system and method is provided to establish a global positioning service with massive availability of “position-learning” radio communication nodes. Each communication node learns of its geographic coordinate in a global sense by harvesting location information from neighboring communication nodes. By conducting telemetry multiple times and implementing an error index, each communication node maintains its geographic coordinate with a precision that improves progressively over time.

column12: METHOD FOR TRACKING PRODUCT HISTORY
column13: A method for tracking product history combines application identifiers (AI) created in a format agreed upon by different manufacturers and employs block chain technology for linking information in series. The invention enables a history network of a specific product to be developed in vertical and horizontal directions, and allows consumers to submit queries online, such that information associated with the product and generated in processes such as manufacturing, warehousing and distribution, is queryable and tamper-proof. With the expansion of the network, additional paths of the product, such as reprocessing and processing paths, can be further tracked, thereby ensuring the reliability of product quality.

column12: Sound recognition model training method and system and non-transitory computer-readable medium
column13: A sound recognition model training method comprises determining a relationship between a sound event and first parameter and deciding a second parameter in response to the relationship, performing sampling on the sound event using the first parameter and the second parameter to generate training audio files, and inputting at least part of the training audio files to a sound recognition model for training the sound recognition model, wherein a length of each of the training audio files is associated with the first parameter, a time difference between every two of the training audio files is associated with the second parameter, and the sound recognition model is used for determining a sound classification.
column32: TW Office Action dated Apr. 23, 2021 in Taiwan application (No. 109135541).

column12: Farm sensing system and sensor data correction method thereof
column13: The invention provides a farm sensing system and a sensor data correction method thereof. The farm sensing system comprises: a cloud server; the sensing device that is used for being connected to a specific sensor arranged in a farm; and the computer device that is used for obtaining specific sensor data generated by a specific sensor from the sensing device through the cloud server. In response to the specific sensor having a potential failure, the sensing device enters a sensor correction mode. In response to the reference sensor being connected to the sensing device, the sensing device periodically receives the specific sensor data and the reference sensor data to establish a correction table and executes a finite state machine to perform a correction procedure on each item in the correction table. In response to the fact that the number of continuous hit times of the corresponding relation of the specific items in the correction table reaches the preset number of times N, the finite-state machine interrupts the correction program and judges that the specific items are correctable.

column12: A HOTSPOT AVOIDANCE METHOD FOR MANUFACTURING INTEGRATED CIRCUITS
column13: A method includes the steps of: cropping a plurality of images from a layout of an integrated circuit; generating a plurality of first hash values, each from one of the plurality of images; loading a plurality of second hash values stored in a hotspot library; and comparing each of the plurality of first hash values with each of the plurality of second hash values. The comparing step includes the steps of calculating a similarity value between each of the plurality of first hash values and each of the plurality of second hash values. In addition, the method further includes the steps of comparing the similarity value with a pre-determined threshold similarity value, and in response to a result that the similarity value is greater than the pre-determined threshold similarity value, recording a position of a corresponding image that has the result. The position is the position of the corresponding image in the layout.
column15: LIU I SHUO;;HSIA CHIH CHUN;;CHOU HSIN TING;;SU KUANHUA;;HONG WILLIAM WEILUN;;CHEN CHIH HUNG;;CHEN KEI WEI

column12: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR PROVIDING PORTABLE RESUME
column13: Disclosed are a method and system for providing a portable resume, wherein after a user of a first client logs in to a server, resume project data of a user is recorded, and thus a resume may be recorded on different work projects, without manually recording the resume, users of a second client and a third client may also sign-off the resume project data corresponding to a first client. Thus by means of the present invention, users who participate in different projects can obtain resume records, which thus becomes a personal resume.
column32: See also references of EP 3982314A4

column12: Method, electronic device, and storage medium for interfacing systems
column13: The present invention provides a method, electronic device, and storage medium for interfacing systems. The method includes an interfacing system can receive a BOM data sent by a first system, and determine whether the BOM data is sent to a second system. When the BOM data is sent to the second system, a new version of a parent item is created according to the BOM data, and a master-slave relationship is established according to the new version of the parent item and the received item of the BOM data. The method further includes graphically constructing the received BOM data according to the master-slave relationship, converting the graphically constructed BOM data into a BOM data structure supported by the second system, and transmitting the converted BOM data to the second system. The implementation of the present invention can interface the first system and the second system by graphically represent the BOM data.

column12: Method of remotely modifying basic input/output system configuration setting
column13: A method of remotely modifying a basic input/output system (BIOS) configuration setting includes steps of: transmitting, by a remote computer, a modification instruction to a cloud server; transmitting, by the cloud server to a POS system, a new configuration value of the BIOS configuration setting contained in the modification instruction; determining, by an embedded controller of the POS system, whether the new configuration value is identical to an original configuration value of the BIOS configuration setting; and by the embedded controller when a result of the determination is negative, updating the BIOS configuration setting and transmitting a response instruction to the remote computer.

column12: Queue analyzing method and image monitoring apparatus
column13: A queue analyzing method is applied to an image monitoring apparatus and can automatically generate an interval threshold according to position variation of objects. The queue analyzing method includes computing a plurality of intervals between all objects inside an image, dividing the plurality of intervals at least into a first group corresponding to a low interval range and a second group corresponding to a high interval range, computing an interval mean and an interval amending value of objects inside the first group, utilizing the interval mean and the interval amending value to generate the interval threshold, and marking some adjacent objects conforming to the interval threshold within the image.

column12: KVM DEVICE SUPPORTING TRANSMISSION OF SUPER SPEED USB SIGNAL AND DISPLAYPORT VIDEO SIGNAL
column13: A KVM device supporting transmission of SuperSpeed USB signal and DisplayPort video signal is disclosed. The KVM device comprises a first USB Type-C connector, a first USB Type-C switch, a second USB Type-C connector, a second USB Type-C switch, a USB switch, a video switch, a control unit, a video connector, and at least one USB connector. When using this KVM device, the first USB Type-C connector and the second USB Type-C connector are electrically connected to a host electronic device through a first USB Type-C cable and a second USB Type-C cable, respectively. Therefore, the KVM device transmits DisplayPort video signal between the host computer and an external display device that is coupled to the video connector. Moreover, the KVM device also transmits SuperSpeed USB signal between the host computer and an external electronic device that is coupled to the USB connector.

column12: HIGH-SPEED MULTIPLEXER FOR VOLTAGE-MODE TRANSMITTER WITH AUTOMATIC PHASE ALIGNMENT TECHNIQUE
System zum Management von Lebensmittelinformationen auf der Basis von Gas
column13: System zum Management von Lebensmittelinformationen auf der Basis von Gas, umfassend:ein Gaserfassungsmodul (10), welches zumindest einen Farbgaserfassungschip (11) umfasst, der mit zumindest einem durch die Lebensmittel emittierten Geruchsmolekül reagiert und zumindest eine Farbreaktion bildet, wobei der Farbgaserfassungschip (11) eine chemische Reaktionsschicht (111) und eine Reaktionsfarbschicht (112), die gestapelt angeordnet sind, umfasst, wobei die chemische Reaktionsschicht (111) mit den Geruchsmolekülen eine chemische Reaktion erzeugt, und wobei die Reaktionsfarbschicht (112) in Übereinstimmung mit der chemischen Reaktion die Farbreaktionen erzeugt und somit zumindest ein dem Lebensmittel entsprechendes Farbbild anzeigt;ein Verarbeitungsmodul (20), welches eine Umwandlungseinheit (21) zum Umwandeln der Farbbilder in eine dem Lebensmittel entsprechende Identifikationsinformation umfasst;ein Blockchain-Modul (30), welches durch eine Mehrzahl von Knoten (31) gebildet ist, in denen die dem Lebensmittel entsprechende Identifikationsinformation gespeichert ist; undein Anzeigemodul (40), welches ein der Identifikationsinformation entsprechendes Identifikationsetikett (41) umfasst.

column12: METHOD FOR INTELLIGENTLY PREVENTING AND HANDLING INDOOR AIR POLLUTION
column13: A method for intelligently preventing and handling indoor air pollution is adapted to be implemented in an indoor space (A) and includes providing a cloud processing device (5) to receive and intelligently compare an outdoor gas detection data, an indoor gas detection data, and device gas detection data with each other. Then, the cloud processing device (5) remotely transmits a control signal to the communication relay station (4) and further to an indoor gas exchange system (2), so that the indoor gas exchange system (2) is capable of intelligently enabling the gas processing device and controlling the operation time of the gas processing device for exchanging a polluted gas in the indoor space (A) with the outdoor gas. Moreover, the gas exchanger (21) can perform purification for the polluted gas at the location of the gas exchanger (21), thereby allowing the polluted gas in the indoor space (A) to be exchanged into a clean, safe, and breathable gas.
column15: MOU HAO-JAN;;LIN CHING-SUNG;;WU CHIN-CHUAN;;HAN YUNG-LUNG;;HUANG CHI-FENG;;LEE WEI-MING

column12: Method for establishing relational database of multispectral rhythm lighting situations and psychological stress indexes
column13: A method for establishing a multi-spectral rhythm lighting situation and psychological stress relation database is characterized by comprising the following steps: downloading a multi-spectral rhythm lighting situation database from a cloud end; a multispectral illumination parameter and a rhythm parameter are selected from the multispectral rhythm illumination situation database to start a light-emitting device for illumination; measuring and judging whether the rhythm parameter reaches a set value or not by an ambient light sensor; when each rhythm parameter in the rhythm illumination situation database reaches a set value, starting the light-emitting device to illuminate; after the blood or saliva of the illuminated person is examined, obtaining a psychological stress index value of the illuminated person; transmitting the rhythm parameter and the psychological stress index value to a cloud by the portable communication device; wherein the rhythm parameters comprise rhythm irradiation parameters and rhythm situation parameters.
column14: BRITISH CAYMAN ISLANDS SHANGDAXIAGU SMART LIGHTING SYSTEMS CO LTD;;LIN JILIANG

column12: System and method for allocation of cloud resources
column15: TSAI CHIH CHUNG;;SHIH SHU FAN;;CHANG KUO HUA

column12: CONSUMER COMMENTS STORAGE METHOD, ELECTRONIC DEVICE, AND STORAGE MEDIUM
column13: A consumer comments storage method and an electronic device are disclosed. In response to a user requesting to make a comment on a target commodity, the method acquires an authorization certificate from a payment platform and obtains a first commodity purchase record of the user according to the authorization certificate. When the target commodity is recorded in the first commodity purchase record, it is determined that the user has a right to comment on the target commodity. A command on the target commodity entered by the user is received and the comment and the authorization certificate are uploaded to a blockchain to enable a smart contract of the blockchain to verify the comment. A verification result returned by the blockchain is received and when the returned result is a verification successful result, the comment is retained. The storing of comments in the blockchain ensures the authenticity of the comments.
column14: HON HAI PREC IND CO LTD
column16: HON HAI PRECISION INDUSTRY CO. LTD (2021-04-12)

column12: ESCROWING SYSTEM FOR CROSS-BLOCKCHAIN THIRD-PARTY SETTLEMENT AND METHOD THEREOF
column13: An escrowing system for cross-blockchain third-party settlement and a method thereof are disclosed. In the escrowing system, an initiating-end host and an accepting-end host escrow digital assets in smart contracts in different blockchains, respectively, and based on a result of delivery of trading entities outside the blockchain, the digital assets escrowed by the smart contracts are transferred or returned, and the arbitration host is permitted to perform trading arbitration, without managing the trading entities, to determine whether the delivery outside the blockchain succeeds. When the arbitration host determines that the delivery outside the blockchain succeeds, the arbitration host can transfer the digital assets escrowed by the initiating-end host and the accepting-end host without consent of the initiating-end host, so as to achieve a technical effect of improving reliability of escrow.
column32: Hongwei Meng, Evan Bian, Cong Tang; "Themis: Towards Decentralized Escrow of Cryptocurrencies without Trusted Third Parties"; 2019 Sixth International Conference on Software Defined Systems (SDS), Pages 266-271; (Year: 2019);;HAYA R. column12: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR RECOMMENDING MULTIMEDIA DATA
column13: A system for recommending multimedia data includes a storage device and a processor. The storage device includes a first storage unit and a second storage unit. The first storage unit is configured to store multimedia data segments. The second storage unit is connected to at least one client device through network, and configured to store operation data generated by the interaction between the at least one client device and the system. The processor coupled to the storage device is configured to analyze the multimedia data segments in the first storage unit in order to generate relevance links between the multimedia data segments, analyze the operation data in the second storage unit, and to generate, based on the relevance links and the operation data, a corresponding recommended list, wherein the recommended list records the multimedia data segments.

column12: Morse code input method and portable electronic device for performing same
column13: A Morse code input method and a portable electronic device for performing the method are provided. The portable electronic device includes a processing circuit and a touchscreen. The method includes: sensing touch events by the touchscreen, recording and comparing time periods of the touch events by the processing circuit; identifying, by the processing circuit, inputs in the ith touch event through (k−1)th touch event as short signals when the time period of the kth touch event is greater than or equal to N times the time period of (k−1)th touch event and the kth touch event is not the last touch event, wherein N is a positive number, k and i are positive integers, with k being greater than or equal to i, and the ith touch event is the earliest one of the touch events in which inputs have not yet been identified as long or short signals.

column12: IMPEDANCE CHIP DETECTION SYSTEM FOR BIOLOGICAL TESTING
column13: An impedance chip detection system for biological testing includes a sensor and a portable detector. The sensor includes an absorbing layer, a sensing layer, and a transmitting layer, and the detector includes a detection slot, a control module provided for an impedance measurement and calculation of a specimen, and a display module for displaying a detection result of the specimen, so that after the sensor is plugged into the detection slot, the sensor performs an impedance measurement and calculation of the specimen and the detector displays the detection result.

column12: Head-mounted spectrum sensing device
column13: A head-mounted spectrum sensing device is provided. The device includes: acoustic signal subsystem, magnetic signal subsystem, ultrasonic signal subsystem, and control and processing subsystem. The device provided by this invention can detect dementia at an early stage.
column14: HON HAI PREC IND CO LTD

column12: ONLINE DART COMPETITION SYSTEM
column13: An online dart competition system including at least two mobile devices having a first and a second image capturing module, configured to capture an dart player image and a dartboard image, respectively; a mirror to reflect/redirect the dartboard image; a wireless transmission module, configured to transmit a score, the dart player image, and the dartboard image to the other mobile device and to receive a score, image, and a dartboard image of a competitor from the other mobile device; and a processor. The processor executes an application and displays the scores and at least two images of the dart player image, the dartboard image, the competitor image, and the competitor dartboard image on a display in a split-screen interface. Thus, the at least two images may be viewed by players during the online competition.

column12: Driving event recording method and system for non-image-based car accident cause determination
column13: A driving event recording method and system for non-image-based car accident cause determination are disclosed. The system includes an external-event determination unit, an internal-driving-behavior-event determination unit, and a processor electrically connected to both determination units. The method is carried out as follows. The external-event determination unit generates information about an external event, and at the same time the internal-driving-behavior-event determination unit generates information about an internal driving behavior event. The processor receives the external-event information and the internal-driving-behavior-event information and uploads both pieces of information to a cloud storage space in a text or program code format for storage in a blockchain.
column15: TANG CHING-CHOU;;YU CHAO-TANG;;HSIEH CHIEN-LIANG;;LI KUN-YU;;HONG JHIH-DENG;;CHUNG YU-HAO;;WU MING-TA;;HUANG SHENG-KAI;;HUANG QING-YUAN

column12: DEVICE AND METHOD FOR WRITING IMAGE FILES INTO MEMORIES, AND NON-TRANSITORY COMPUTER READABLE MEDIUM
column13: The invention provides a device and a method for writing an image file into a memory, and a non-transitory computer readable medium. Provided is a device for writing image files into memories, which includes a memory and a processor. The memory is configured to store an instruction. The processor is coupled to the memory, a hardware database and a software database. The processor is configured to access and execute the instruction from the memory to: confirm a production condition of a product, wherein the production condition includes a hardware component characteristic and a software component characteristic; generate an image file by comparing the hardware component characteristic with a plurality of hardware characteristic data in the hardware database, and comparing the software component characteristic with a plurality of software characteristic data in the software database; and write the image file into a product flash memory. Therefore, the corresponding image file can be automatically inquired, learned and generated according to the processor specification and the memory specification of the product, and the product is written into the memory.

column12: VIRTUAL MACHINE BUILDING METHOD BASED ON HYPER CONVERGED INFRASTRUCTURE
Speaking end device, receiving end device and cloud server of user data fingerprint verification operation
column13: A speaking end device, receiving end device and cloud server of user data fingerprint verification operation are provided. The speaking end device sends a communication request to a receiving end device and sends a first data stream to the cloud server in response to the communication request that includes at least a display number, and the first data stream at least includes a receiving end number. The cloud server sends a user data fingerprint corresponding to the speaking end device to the receiving end device according to the receiving end number, and the receiving end device sends a second data stream carrying the display number and the user data fingerprint to the cloud server. The cloud server verifies the second data stream to generate a verification result, and the receiver device determines the legitimacy of the communication request according to the verification result.
column15: LEE YEN-JU;;LIAO YU-YU;;SONG JHENG-HUAN;;KUO CHIEN-FU;;CHENG SHENG-FENG

column12: OS-independent peripheral plug-and-play and driver update method for embedded systems and firmware data transmission method for embedded system platform
column13: An OS-independent peripheral plug-and-play and driver update method for embedded system and firmware data transmission method for embedded system platform is provided. The method includes: determining whether a peripheral device is connected to the embedded system host; when the peripheral device is connected to the embedded system host, acquire the ID of the peripheral device; connecting to a firmware server; according to the ID, acquiring a driver; packing the driver into a firmware and transmitting to the embedded system host; and performing a firmware update.

column12: Digital content management system and method and electronic device
column13: A digital content management method is applied to an electronic device, the electronic device comprises a display screen and a network interface module, the network interface module is connected witha plurality of cloud servers, and the management method comprises the steps that a user interface is displayed on the display screen so that a user can input search conditions; generating a search instruction according to an input search condition, the search instruction is sent to each cloud server through the network interface module, the search instruction is used for controlling the cloud server to search for digital content meeting the search condition, and the digital content is fed back to the network interface module when at least one part of digital content is searched for; generatinga user interface object from the digital content fed back by each cloud server according to functions and affiliated information provided by the cloud server for the digital content; and summarizingthe user interface objects of different cloud servers into an object list, and displaying the object list on the display screen.

column12: NETWORK SERVICE SYSTEM AND NETWORK SERVICE METHOD
Health detection device having gas detection function
column13: A health detection device having gas detection function is provided and includes a main body. The main body includes at least one gas inlet, at least one gas outlet and a gas detection module. The gas detection module includes a piezoelectric actuator and at least one sensor. The gas outside the main body is guided into the main body from the gas inlet, is detected by the sensor to obtain a gas information, and is discharged from the gas outlet by the piezoelectric actuator.

column12: Operating method for wearable device interacting with operated device in virtual reality and operating device thereof
column13: An operating method in a virtual environment through a wearable device is disclosed, wherein the wearable device has a motion sensor, the virtual environment has an operated object and a virtual device corresponding to the wearable device, the corresponding virtual device has a first operational data constraint, and the operated object has a second operational data constraint. The operating method comprises the following steps of: using the motion sensor to generate a motion sensed data; causing the corresponding virtual device to generate a derived data according to the motion sensed data, wherein the derived data indicates an interaction relationship between the virtual device and the operated object; and when the virtual device separated from the operated object under the interaction relationship, moving the operated object in accordance with the derived data.

column12: System and method for public opinion sentiment analysis
column13: A system and a method for public opinion sentiment analysis are provided. The method includes: receiving training data and public opinion sentiment data; generating a selecting model according to the training data; selecting at least one sentiment analyzing model from a plurality of sentiment analyzing models according to the selecting model and the public opinion sentiment data; and generating, by using the at least one sentiment analyzing model, a public opinion sentiment analysis result according to the public opinion sentiment data.

column12: Detachable smart speaker system and control method thereof
column13: A detachable smart speaker system and a control method thereof are disclosed. The detachable smart speaker system includes a core device and a pairing device. The core device includes a microphone array, a CPU, a wireless communication module, a core bridge element and a database. The microphone array, the core bridge element and the database are connected to the CPU. The database includes plural audio parameter sets. The pairing device includes a speaker, a microcontroller unit, a pairing bridge element, and an identification code. The speaker and the pairing bridge element are connected to the microcontroller unit, respectively. The pairing device is detachably connected to the core device through the pairing bridge element, and a corresponding audio parameter set is to be selected from the audio parameter sets of the database according to the identification code. The core device controls the pairing device according to the corresponding audio parameter set.

column12: 电池绑定方法及系统
column13: 一种由销售端移动装置所执行且适用于将电池装置绑定至载具的电池绑定方法，包含载具识别码取得步骤及绑定步骤。在该载具识别码取得步骤中，该销售端移动装置取得对应该载具的载具识别码。在该绑定步骤中，该销售端移动装置藉由近场通信协议将该载具识别码传送至该电池装置，以令该电池装置储存有该载具识别码。

column12: METHOD OF REMOTE ABNORMAL STATE RESET OF RACKS USED IN DATA CENTER
column13: FIELD: computer engineering.SUBSTANCE: invention relates to a rack server and can be used to analyze and reset abnormal status of racks. Method comprises steps of: regularly receiving, by an administration system, any information from a rack control protocol (RMC) and multiple motherboard controllers (BMC); recording each work action performed by an administrator through an administration system; analyzing information and action by the administration system to determine whether any of the RMCs or BMCs in one of several default states requiring attention, and automatic execution of the procedure of remote recovery of one of RMC and several BMCs for resetting of existing abnormal state of RMC or BMC, if it is determined that RMC or BMC is in abnormal state, but still maintains connection with administration system.EFFECT: automatic execution of procedure for remote recovery of rack control controllers or motherboard controllers.10 cl, 9 dwg, 2 tbl

column12: Fault tolerance method and system for virtual machine group
column13: A fault tolerance method and system for a virtual machine group is proposed. The method includes: establishing fault tolerance backup connections of virtual machines between a virtual machine hypervisor of at least one primary host and a virtual machine hypervisor of at least one backup host to perform fault tolerance backup of the virtual machines, where the aforesaid virtual machines are included in a fault tolerance group; when a synchronizer determines that at least one first virtual machine among the primary virtual machines in the fault tolerance group is performing a failover, informing, by the synchronizer, other remaining primary virtual machine(s) among the primary virtual machines in the fault tolerance group to perform a failover of each, or to return respectively to a last fault tolerance backup state of each and continue performing a fault tolerance backup of each.

column12: VIRTUAL MAKE-UP SYSTEM AND VIRTUAL MAKE-UP COLORING METHOD
Commodity information presentation and intelligent purchase system and method
column13: The invention discloses a commodity information presentation and intelligent purchase system and method. The handheld device provides a commodity bar code image with one of the commodity two-dimensional bar codes to a server. The server feeds back the commodity three-dimensional image and at least one piece of commodity display information to the handheld device; the handheld device displays a three-dimensional image of a commodity in an augmented reality mode and provides a virtual shopping user interface. Commodity selection and purchase are carried out on a virtual shopping user interface and a commodity three-dimensional image, the handheld device generates a selection and purchase order and provides the selection and purchase order to a merchant server, and the merchant server delivers selected and purchased commodities according to the selection and purchase order, so that the technical effects of providing augmented reality display of the commodities and providing intelligent purchase can be achieved.

column12: Interconnecting system and interconnecting device for outdoor activity group capable of delivering messages among members of the outdoor activity group without external Internet or communication device
column13: The present invention provides an interconnecting system and interconnection device for the use of outdoor activity groups. The interconnecting device is used by each member of the outdoor activity group, respectively. Each interconnecting device may utilize a RF signal transmission module on a public open frequency band to receive and transmit the data packets containing the local identification code, the local positioning message and the positioning messages of other interconnecting devices without the need of external Internet or communication devices, such that each interconnecting device may be equipped with the functions of active transmission and relay transmission, respectively. Thus, each member of the outdoor activity group may be a relay station to unlimitedly relay and extend the communication distance of the whole group. The present invention may overcome the problem of lost contact among members that are unable to receive signals due to too long distances, and is particularly suitable for group activities, such as outdoor mountain climbing, exploration or motorcade, and may effectively enhance safety for outdoor activities.
