column12: System and method for provisioning and monitoring virtual machine virtual network interface controller
column13: This invention discloses a system and a method for provisioning and monitoring virtual machine virtual network interface controller, comprising a provisioning module for performing a provisioning process of the virtual machine's network card and a client-side cross-platform monitoring unit installed on the client operating system in the virtual machine. The provisioning module sets the network card to be enabled as the first internet protocol or as the second internet protocol in the provisioning process, and the single network card can only be selected as the first internet protocol or the second internet protocol, such that a single virtual machine has multiple addresses for the first internet protocol and the second internet protocol at the same time. The client-side cross-platform monitoring unit captures monitoring data of the client-side operating system in the virtual machine, wherein the monitoring data includes the network card monitoring data of the first internet protocol or/and the second internet protocol in the network card.

column12: Internet of vehicles system performing connection authentication through a public network and connection method
column13: An Internet of Vehicles system performing connection authentication through a public network and a connection method using the same are disclosed. A mobile device transmits an authentication code to a remote cloud server to complete an online identity authentication, searches a local vehicular computer through a Bluetooth connection after completion of the online identity authentication, exchanges information with the vehicular computer, authenticates the exchanged information, and establishes connection with the vehicular computer after completion of the authentication. For control over the vehicular computer of a vehicle through the mobile device, the online identity authentication must be completed before data exchange and established secure connection, thereby effectively enhancing effectiveness of connection security and lowering the risk of vehicle theft.

column12: Scaling device of real-time image and scaling method for using the same
column13: A scaling device of a real-time image and a scaling method are disclosed, the scaling device includes a storing unit, a receiving unit, a determining unit, a computing unit, and an outputting unit, wherein the storing unit stores multiple lookup tables respectively corresponding to different scaling algorithms. The receiving unit receives a real-time image from an image outputting device. The determining unit decides a scaling algorithm in accordance with a content of the real-time image and a demanded scaling magnification, and reads one of the lookup tables from the storing unit based on the scaling algorithm. The computing unit performs a scaling process to the real-time image to generate a processed image in accordance with the lookup table read by the determining unit. The outputting unit outputs the processed image.

column12: INTELLIGENT VEHICULAR ELECTRONIC KEY SYSTEM
column13: The present invention relates to an intelligent electronic key system for a vehicle. The intelligent electronic key system for a vehicle includes a cloud server, a first user device, a second user device, and a vehicle control unit. The vehicle control unit is installed in a vehicle and connects to a cloud server via the Internet. When electronic key sharing information is activated, the first user device transmits an electronic key information link to the second user device. After the electronic key information link is activated, the second user device transmits an authority authentication request to a cloud server. Also, the second user device receives access confirmation from the cloud server. The second user device activates a vehicle control function and transmits a vehicle control signal to the vehicle control unit by the cloud server so that the vehicle control unit controls the motion of the vehicle. Therefore, a sharing access authority of an electronic key improves convenience in the motion of the vehicle.

column12: Data processing apparatus and data processing method for internet of things system
column13: A data processing apparatus and a data processing method thereof for an Internet of Things (IoT) system are provided. The data processing apparatus generates a plurality of diagnosis rule data, diagnoses each of the device data received from at least one IoT apparatus to generate a plurality of diagnosis log data, packages the device data, the diagnosis log data and the diagnosis rule data respectively based on a preset data amount to generate a plurality of device files, a plurality of diagnosis log files and a plurality of diagnosis rule files individually, stores each device file, each diagnosis log file and each diagnosis rule file in an interplanetary file system individually, and stores hash values of each device file, each diagnosis log file and each diagnosis rule file in a blockchain system individually.
column32: Search Report to the corresponding Great Britain Patent Application rendered by the Intellectual Property Office dated May 1, 2019, 5 pages.;;Pourmajidi, William; Miranskyy, Andriy, “Logchain: Blockchain-Assisted Log Storage”, 2018 IEEE 11th International Conference on Cloud Computing, Jul. 2018, pp. 978-982, 5 pages.;;Machado, Caciano; Fröhlich, Antonio Augusto, “IoT Data Integrity Verification for Cyber-Physical Systems using Blockchain”, 2018 IEEE 21st International Symposium on Real-Time Distributed Computing, May 2018, pp. 83-90, 8 pages.;;Search Report to the corresponding Taiwan Patent Application rendered by the Taiwan Intellectual Property Office (TIPO) dated Oct. 25, 2018, 10 pages (including English translation).

column12: Electronic device and method for turnover rate prediction
column13: An electronic device and a method for turnover rate prediction are provided, wherein the method includes: receiving human resource (HR) data; generating a feature data set according to the HR data; inputting a first sub set of the feature data set to a first machine learning (ML) model to generate a first prediction; inputting a second sub set of the feature data set to a second ML model to generate a second prediction; inputting the first prediction, the second prediction, and a third sub set of the feature data set to a third ML model to generate a first turnover rate prediction.

column12: Device for Mood Feature Extraction and Method of the Same
column13: A device for mood feature extraction includes a control unit, a display coupled to the control unit, a memory coupled to the control unit, and a mood feature capture module coupled to the control unit to extract a facial image of a user to generate a mood feature of the user. A selection module can be activated based-on the mood feature.

column12: LINEAR MOTION SYSTEM
column13: A linear motion system includes a guiding member, a moving member, a plurality of rolling members, a controller, a preload sensing member and a preload adjusting module. The moving member is slidably disposed on the guiding member, and the moving member and the guiding member together form a circulation path. The rolling members are accommodated in the circulation path. The preload sensing member is disposed on the moving member. The preload sensing member detects a preload value generated by the rolling members and applied to the moving member, and outputs a detecting signal to the controller. The preload driver and adjusting assembly of the preload adjusting module are disposed on the moving member. The controller controls the preload driver to adjust the adjusting assembly according to the detecting signal to adjust the preload value to a preset value.

column12: Custom gesture collection and recognition system having machine learning accelerator
column13: A gesture recognition system includes a transmission unit, a first reception chain, a second reception chain, a customized gesture collection engine and a machine learning accelerator. The transmission unit is used to transmit a transmission signal to detect a gesture. The first reception chain is used to receive a first signal and generate first feature map data corresponding to the first signal. The second reception chain is used to receive a second signal and generate second feature map data corresponding to the second signal. The first signal and the second signal are generated by the gesture reflecting the transmission signal. The customized gesture collection engine is used to generate gesture data according to at least the first feature map data and the second feature map data. The machine learning accelerator is used to perform machine learning with the gesture data.

column12: TRANSACTION AUTHENTICATION METHOD
column13: The present disclosure relates to a transaction authentication method in which a process for transaction safety is created: a consumption confirmation is sent to an authentication box from a transaction platform on which a user has a customer behavior through the internet; the authentication box notifies the user based on a default configuration; the user replies the authentication box by confirmed information; a dedicated confirmation code is replied to the transaction platform from the authentication box and the customer behavior of the user is approved by the transaction platform.

column12: Encryption method
column13: The invention discloses an encryption method, which is applied to a device end and comprises the following steps of: A, checking whether the size of a file is smaller than a maximum transmission unit by a processing unit of the device end, if the size of the file is larger than the maximum transmission unit, performing a step B, and if the size of the file is smaller than the maximum transmission unit, performing a step C; if the size of the file is smaller than the maximum transmission unit, the step C is carried out; b, encrypting a specific packet in the file by means of the processing unit; and C, encrypting the file by means of the processing unit.
column14: DONGGUAN FUWAI ELECTRONIC CO LTD;;FOXLINK IMAGE TECH CO LTD

column12: Device for Marking Image Data
column13: A device including a display panel, a storage circuit, and a processing circuit is provided. The display panel of the device is utilized to display a first image data, and a region of interest can be circled on the first image data. The processing circuit of the device is utilized to receive at least one first mark content and a first region information of the region of interest, and connect the first region information of the region of interest to the at least one first mark content. In this manner, medical professionals can quickly make an initial diagnosis by means of the at least one first mark content of the first image data.

column12: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR BATTERY BINDING
column13: A method for battery binding that is to be implemented by a service end electronic device includes obtaining a carrier identifier corresponding to a carrier device. The method further includes sending the carrier identifier to a battery device via near-field communication for storage in the battery device.
column15: WANG LIANG-CHI;;HUNG CHUNG-JUI;;CHEN YUH-REY;;CHUANG PO-YU;;LIN JEN-CHIUN;;LIU TE-CHUAN

column12: BATTERY CONNECTOR ADAPTER
column13: A battery connector adapter (2) includes a housing (21), a positive electrode terminal (22), a negative electrode terminal (23), two positive electrode connectors (24) and two negative electrode connectors (25). The positive electrode terminal (22), the negative electrode terminal (23), the two positive electrode connectors (24), and the two negative electrode connectors (25) are disposed in the housing (21). The two positive electrode connectors (24) are electrically connected to the positive electrode terminal (22) respectively by the two first transmission lines (26). The two negative electrode connectors (25) are electrically connected to the negative electrode terminal (23) respectively by the two second transmission lines (27), wherein the two first transmission lines (26) and the two second transmission lines (27) are disposed in the housing (21).
column32: ANONYMOUS: "[Jack-up single-phase two-in-four-out junction box FJ6 junction box terminal block household meter box connector]", 18 January 2010 (2010-01-18), XP002800481, Retrieved from the Internet <URL:https://item.jd.com/64565757727.html> [retrieved on 20200924]

column12: EYE CENTER LOCALIZATION METHOD AND LOCALIZATION SYSTEM THEREOF
column13: An eye center localization method includes performing an image sketching step, a frontal face generating step, an eye center marking step and a geometric transforming step. The image sketching step is performed to drive a processing unit to sketch a face image from the image. The frontal face generating step is performed to drive the processing unit to transform the face image into a frontal face image according to a frontal face generating model. The eye center marking step is performed to drive the processing unit to mark a frontal eye center position information on the frontal face image. The geometric transforming step is performed to drive the processing unit to calculate two rotating variables between the face image and the frontal face image, and calculate the eye center position information according to the two rotating variables and the frontal eye center position information.

column12: CLOUD DEPLOYMENT BOOT IMAGE ELECTRONIC DEVICE, AND BOOT IMAGE CLOUD DEPLOYMENT SYSTEM AND METHOD
column13: A boot image cloud deployment system and method are provided. The system includes an electronic device and a server. The server includes a storage medium and a control circuit. The electronic device is configured to issue a request instruction. The storage medium is configured to store a plurality of boot images. Each boot image includes a plurality of object files, and a combination sequence of the object files of each boot image is different from a combination sequence of the object files of the other boot images. The control circuit is configured to send back one of the boot images to the electronic device according to the request instruction. The electronic device executes the received boot image.

column12: IMAGE PROCESSING METHOD
column13: An image processing method is provided. In the image processing method, a plurality of image quality assessment methods are received, a total execution time of a cloud server for executing image quality assessment methods is calculated, and individual execution times of an image processing device for executing image quality assessment are respectively calculated. The image quality assessment methods are classified into first type of image quality assessment methods and second type of image quality assessment methods according to the individual execution times and the total execution time. The first type of image quality assessment method are performed by the image processing device, and the second type of image quality assessment method are performed by the cloud server. Accordingly, an efficiency of image recognition may be improved by the image processing method classifying the image quality assessment methods.

column12: Payment verification method and system, electronic equipment and storage medium
column13: The invention relates to the technical field of payment authentication, and provides a payment verification method and system, electronic equipment and a storage medium. The payment verification method comprises the following steps: when a payment channel between an earphone and paired payment equipment is opened, monitoring a voice instruction received by a sound receiving device of the earphone; in response to a payment voice instruction, extracting voiceprint features of the payment voice instruction; verifying the voiceprint feature, and judging whether a user identity corresponding to the voiceprint feature is matched with a pre-stored target user identity of the earphone; and if yes, transmitting a payment instruction to the payment device. According to the invention, through the cooperation between the earphone and the paired payment device, the payment security is improved while the payment of the user is facilitated, and the user experience is improved.
column14: INVENTEC APPLIANCES SHANGHAI;;INVENTEC APPLIANCES SHANGHAI CORP;;INVENTEC APPLIANCES CORP

column12: Personal information trading device
VEHICLE INTELLIGENT LIFTING SYSTEM
column13: A vehicle intelligent lifting system, configured to be mounted to a vehicle body including a Controller Area Network (CAN) bus, is provided, including: a control module, in communication with the CAN bus, configured to obtain a signal from the CAN bus; a lifting device, in communication with the control module; wherein the control module determines whether to control the lifting device to operate according to vehicle information from the CAN bus.

column12: SYSTEM OF LIGHTING WITH MULTISPECTRAL CIRCADIAN RHYTHM LIGHTING SCENARIO AND THE LIGHTING METHOD THEROF
column13: A lighting system with a multispectral circadian rhythm lighting scenario, which performs lighting by the following procedures, the procedures include: downloading the multispectral circadian rhythm lighting scenario database from a portable communication device to the cloud through the Internet; the portable communication device selects a multispectral lighting parameter and a circadian rhythm parameter from the multispectral circadian rhythm lighting scenario database to start the light-emitting device to control the illuminator to perform lighting; after the blood or saliva test of the light control subjects, the psychological stress index values of the illuminator were obtained; the portable communication device or the management control module transmits the circadian rhythm parameters and psychological stress index values to the cloud.
column14: LIN LAWRENCE;;STRONGLED SMART LIGHTING CAYMAN CO LTD
column16: STRONGLED SMART LIGHTING (CAYMAN) CO. LTD (2022-06-10);;LIN LAWRENCE (2022-06-10)

column12: 资料分析系统及资料分析方法
column13: 一种资料分析系统及资料分析方法，可以针对病历内文进行优化，并将优化后的病历报告输入一应用模型，使得应用模型能够将病历报告与诊断码间连结，输出精准的推荐诊断码。诊断码的查找工作有了应用模型辅助后，借此进一步提高了医疗的整体品质。

column15: 廖柏嘉;;林漪寒;;吴明伦;;胡文芯

column12: PHYSIOLOGICAL SIGNAL CORRECTION DEVICE, CORRECTION METHOD, AND WEARABLE DEVICE WITH CORRECTION FUNCTION
column13: A physiological signal correction device, a correction method, and a wearable device with a correction function are provided. The physiological signal correction device includes a physiological signal sensor, a warping sensor, and a signal processing device. The physiological signal sensor is attached to an object to be detected to obtain a physiological signal value from at least one sensing electrode. The warping sensor is disposed on the physiological signal sensor and detects whether a warping condition of the physiological signal sensor with respect to the object to be detected occurs. The signal processing device corrects the physiological signal value provided by the physiological signal sensor according to the warping condition. The warping condition is caused by a distance between a part of the sensing electrode and the object to be detected or a change in a contact area between a part of the sensing electrode and the object to be detected.

column12: フィットネスエクササイズシステム及び運動器材の改造方法
column13: 【課題】既存の運動器材に後付けにより実装することにより、フィットネスインストラクターが運動内容を把握し得るフィットネスエクササイズシステム及び運動器材の改造方法を提供する。【解決手段】第１の感知モジュールは第１の移動部の移動を検出するために用いられ、第１の通信接続を介して検出されたデータを送信し、制御モジュールは第１の運動器材に隣接する位置に設けられ、且つ、制御モジュールと運動器材は分離され、制御モジュールは、検出されたデータを受信し、検出されたデータに基づいて、第１の移動値を計算し、第１の移動値をディスプレイ装置に送信する。【選択図】図１
column14: 緯創資通股▲ふん▼有限公司
column15: リャオ シン－ホイ;;チョン イー－シュアン;;邱志豪;;陳泰運

column12: Spectrometer device, mobile device, spectrometer system and operation method of spectrometer system
column13: A spectrometer system comprises a spectrometer device, a mobile device and a cloud server. The spectrometer device is configured to scan a target object to generate spectral data according to one setof spectral scanning setting parameters in a plurality of sets of spectral scanning setting parameters. The mobile device is configured to set the spectrometer device to select one set of spectral scanning setting parameters from a plurality of sets of spectral scanning setting parameters and scan the target object, wherein the mobile device receives spectral data from the spectrometer device andoutputs the spectral data. The cloud server is configured to store a plurality of detection models, receive spectral data from the mobile device, analyze the spectral data according to one of the detection models and output the analysis results to the mobile device. The spectrometer system of the present invention can save network transmission flow and avoid affecting the analysis of the object and the establishment of the models due to transmission of unspecified spectral data and effectively control the validity of spectral scanning.

column12: Data collection and analysis device
column13: A data collection and analysis device includes a true random number generator, a processor unit, and an output circuit. The true random number generator generates a plurality of random numbers without a seed. The processor unit, based on the plurality of random numbers, de-identifies identification information in original data stream with an original character to generate a second data stream with a second character. The output circuit outputs the second data stream to a remote server.

column12: Interactive responding method and computer system using the same
column13: An interactive responding method includes receiving an input data from a user; generating an output data according to the input data retrieving a plurality of attributes from the output data; retrieving a plurality of attributes from the output data; determining a plurality of interactions corresponding to the plurality of attributes of the output data; and displaying the plurality of interactions via a non-player character; wherein the input data and the output data are related to a text.

column12: PHYSICAL POWER DIGITAL CURRENCY TRANSACTION SYSTEM AND TRANSACTION METHOD
column13: To provide a physical power digital currency transaction system and transaction method that vitalize the green energy industry, enable everyone to effectively use green energy, and create a sharing economy in the power market.SOLUTION: A physical power digital currency transaction system performs transaction of power digital currency where portable powers are combined. The transaction system includes: a transaction management host on a power bank platform; at least one merchant's transaction point device; and a portable energy storage device of at least one individual member. The transaction system allows the individual member to be connected with the transaction management host, the transaction point device, and the portable energy storage device, enabling mutual transmission of transaction data, thereby, the individual member can perform transaction through the portable energy storage device and the transaction point device to purchase or sell power. Usable power digital currency converted through the power also enables transaction of other commodities.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 2

column12: Network equipment power supply and heat dissipation system for network equipment power supply
column13: The invention provides a network equipment power supply and a heat dissipation system for the network equipment power supply. The heat dissipation system comprises a liquid cooling heat dissipation device and an air cooling heat dissipation device. The liquid cooling heat dissipation device comprises a liquid inlet, a liquid outlet and a liquid cooling pipeline communicated between the liquid inlet and the liquid outlet, and the liquid cooling pipeline can take away heat generated by a first device arranged around the liquid cooling pipeline through a liquid cooling medium flowing in the liquid cooling pipeline. The air cooling heat dissipation device comprises an air inlet, an air outlet and an air cooling channel communicated between the air inlet and the air outlet, and air flow passing through the air cooling channel can take away heat generated by the network equipment power supply. Mixed heat dissipation is carried out by combining the respective characteristics of water cooling heat dissipation and air cooling heat dissipation, so that the heat dissipation efficiency is effectively improved, and a new choice is provided for the design of a high-power-density power supply.
column15: ZHU LI;;DONG KAI;;HUANG YONG;;YANG JUN;;RUAN JIE

column12: Head-mounted magnetic resonance imaging device and dementia monitoring system
column13: This disclosure relates to a head-mounted magnetic resonance imaging device. The head-mounted magnetic resonance imaging device includes a head-mounted imaging unit, a controlling computer, and a signal processing computer. The signal processing computer includes a controlling module, a data processing module, an image reconstructing module, an image storing module, and an image comparing module. The image reconstructing module forms cross-sectional scanned images of an user's brain memory showing microstructure. The image comparing module is configured to analyze and comparing the cross-sectional scanned images of the user's brain memory showing microstructure collected at different times so that the controlling computer provided user suggestions corresponding to different judgement results of the image comparing module. The system may comprise a dementia monitoring system that provides users with advisory dementia warnings so users may be advised to seek further medical advice.
column14: HON HAI PREC IND CO LTD
column16: HON HAI PRECISION INDUSTRY CO. LTD (2018-03-10)

column12: System for projecting naked 3D image from selected 2D image
column13: The invention discloses a system for projecting a naked three-dimensional image from a selected two-dimensional image. The system according to the invention includes a data processing apparatus, a projection screen device and an image projection apparatus. The selected two-dimensional image is imported into the data processing apparatus. A predetermined three-dimensional virtual sphere is stored in the data processing apparatus. At least one processor of the data processing apparatus executes an image processing application to project the selected two-dimensional image onto the predetermined three-dimensional virtual sphere according to a spherical plane coordinate conversion way to generate a three-dimensional spherical volume image. The projection screen device has a hemispherical projection surface. The image projection apparatus is capable of communicating with the data processing apparatus. The data processing apparatus projects the three-dimensional spherical image onto the hemispherical projection surface via the image projection apparatus such that the naked three-dimensional image associated with the three-dimensional spherical image is exhibited on the hemispherical projection surface.

column12: DEPTH WIRE-CONTROLLED AQUACULTURE DEVICE
column13: A depth wire-controlled aquaculture device, having a net cage, float balls, a depth sensor and at least one wire control module, is illustrated. The net cage has a frame and a net body. The float balls are connected to the net cage. The depth sensor is installed on the net cage and detects an underwater depth of the net cage to generate a depth signal. The wire control module comprises a controller, a reel, a driver and a connection wire. The connection wire is connected to the net cage and wound around the reel, the controller is signally connected the depth sensor and the driver, the depth signal is transmitted to the controller, the controller controls the driver according to the depth signal, and the driver drives the reel to rotate to draw or release the connection wire, so as to change the underwater depth of the net cage.

column12: MESSAGE TRANSMISSION METHOD
column13: The present invention discloses a message transmission method. A first portable device transmits an identity information of a first wireless signal transmitter and a message content to a cloud server. The cloud server analyzes the message content to obtain a message tag of the message content, and obtain a wireless signal transmitter tag of the first wireless signal transmitter according to the identity information. The cloud server then obtains at least one target identity information representing at least one target wireless signal transmitter by using the message tag and the wireless signal transmitter tag, to obtain an association between the message content and the at least one target identity information. When receiving a second identity information, a second portable device compares the second identity information with the at least one target identity information and receives the message content from the cloud server.

column12: SMART ADJUSTMENT SYSTEM AND ITS METHOD
column13: To provide a smart adjustment system and its method.SOLUTION: A smart adjustment system according to the present invention comprises a cloud computing device and a data receiver. The cloud computing device includes a neutral network model storing attenuation factor prediction for a tool based on model data on a plurality of machine tools and based on different processing parameter prediction. The data receiver receives model data on a target machine tool. The cloud computing device compares the model data on the target machine tool and the model data on the machine tools by using the neutral network modal and calculates a predicted processing parameter having an attenuation factor prediction for a tool. The target machine tool performs a processing work on the basis of the predicted processing parameter.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 1
column15: HUANG MU SHUI;;WU YING FAN;;LI XUE RU;;ZHONG XIAO YAN;;CHEN LIANG YU

column12: PRODUCTION SCHEDULING SYSTEM AND METHOD
column13: A production scheduling system includes a scheduling calculation host, multiple databases connected to the scheduling calculation host, and a user terminal. The scheduling calculation host includes adata cleaning module, adapted for cleaning production data from the multiple databases; a pre-processing calculation module, adapted for pre-processing and calculating the production data from the data cleaning module to obtain an extraction data; and a reinforcement learning model, adapted for producing an optimal scheduling decision according to a score function and the extraction data. The system can perform calculations based on various production data and quickly produce an optimal scheduling decision to simplify production scheduling operations and improve enterprise production efficiency.
column14: SYNERGIES INTELLIGENT SYSTEMS INC TAIWAN BRANCH

column12: Method for data integrity checking, and integrated circuit
column13: An integrated circuit device can comprise addressable memory, and a receiver. Data integrity logic can be coupled to the input data path and configured to receive a data stream having a reference address, and a plurality of data chunks with data integrity codes. Also, the data integrity logic can include a configuration store to store configuration data for the data integrity checking. Also, the integrated circuit can include logic to parse the data chunks and the data integrity codes from the data stream, and logic to compute the data integrity codes of data chunks in the received data stream, and compare the computed data integrity codes with received data integrity codes to test for data errors in the received data stream. The data integrity logic includes logic responsive to the configuration data that control the data integrity logic. In one aspect, the data integrity data indicates a floating boundary data integrity mode or a fixed boundary data integrity mode.

column12: MEMORY MANAGEMENT APPARATUS AND MEMORY MANAGEMENT METHOD
column13: A memory management method includes: performing a bloom filtering operation on a plurality of logic block addresses to determine a read and written frequency of each of the logic block addresses; setting a first program/erase (P/E) cycle threshold and a second P/E cycle threshold value, wherein the first P/E cycle threshold value is smaller than the second P/E cycle threshold value; dividing each of physical memory blocks into a first type memory block, a second type memory block or a third type memory block according to the first P/E cycle threshold value and the second P/E cycle threshold value; and, allocating each of the logic block addresses to the first type memory block, the second type memory block or the third type memory block according to the read and written frequency of corresponding logic block addresses.
column14: MACRONIX INT CO LTD;;MACRONIX INT LTD
column15: WANG WEI-CHEN;;LIN PING-HSIEN;;WANG TSE-YUAN;;CHANG YUAN-HAO;;KUO TEI-WEI

column12: PERSONAL CLOUD SYSTEM AND RELATED LOCALIZATION METHOD
column13: To provide a personal cloud system and a related localization method.SOLUTION: A personal cloud system 10 includes smart devices and a server having virtual machines. Each virtual machine includes a target text unit. The target text unit undergoes information connection to a header having a sort code. The header performs information connection of a logically configurable unit having image files. Each image file includes an identification ID corresponding to the sort code so as to be accurately read by the header. The smart devices are connected to the server through the Internet or a local area network in order to read a logically configurable unit having an application. The application is read according to the sort code to which the header corresponds, and is displayed. Thus, the smart devices load a corresponding image file, and execute the image file.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 1

column12: Artificial intelligence decision making neuro network core system and information processing method using the same
column13: Artificial intelligence decision making neuro network core system and information processing method using the same include an electronic device linking to a unsupervised neural network interface module, a asymmetric hidden layers input module linking to the unsupervised neural network interface module and a neuron module formed with tree-structured data, a layered weight parameter module linking to the neuron module formed with tree-structured data and an non-linear PCA (Principal Component Analysis) module, an input module of the lead backpropagation unit linking to the non-linear PCA module and a tuning module, an output module of the lead backpropagation unit linking to tuning module and the non-linear PCA module; when the electronic device receives raw data, processing and learning the raw data via all the modules, and updating programs to generate decision results that accommodate a variety of scenarios, in order to elevate the reference value and practicality of the decision result.

column12: METHOD OF PRESENTING MULTIMEDIA CONTENT WITH THIRD PARTY CONTROL
column13: The present invention provides a method of presenting multimedia content with third party control, which can specify different multimedia content providing devices to provide different types of multimedia content data, and also can specify different multimedia content presenting devices to present different multimedia content data. In the present invention, the multimedia content data provided by the multimedia content providing device can also be transmitted to the multimedia content presenting device after being further processed. The present invention can be applied to use situations including transmission and presentation of the multimedia content data such as video conferencing, voice conferencing, advertising, online broadcasting and sound broadcasting.

column12: UNINTERRUPTIBLE POWER SYSTEM AND OPERATION METHOD THEREOF
column13: An uninterruptible power system and an operation method thereof are provided. The uninterruptible power system has a plurality of function blocks which form a topology structure of the uninterruptible power system. The uninterruptible power system comprises a sensing circuit and a control circuit. The sensing circuit is configured to sense the function blocks and to generate a sensing data accordingly. The control circuit is configured to determine, according to the sensing data, whether an event occurs in any of the function blocks. When the determination is yes, the control circuit generates an event code corresponding to the event and outputs a control command accordingly. The control command is used to control a display interface to display the event code, and is used to control the display interface to send a prompt message through a function block graphic symbol corresponding to the event code in the displayed topology structure.

column12: Encoding method applied to key tree, decoding method applied to key tree and electronic device
column13: The invention discloses anencoding method applied to a one-key tree. The encoding method comprises the following steps: encoding a part of non-leaf nodes in the key tree to generate a plurality of metadata; and writing an encoding result of the key tree into a storage device, wherein the encoding result comprises the plurality of metadata respectively corresponding to the part of non-leaf nodes.

column12: System and method for adding sports equipment with intelligent function
column13: A method of retrofitting a sports apparatus includes detachably connecting a sensing module to a moving portion of a sports apparatus, the sensing module configured to detect movement of the moving portion and transmit the detected data through a first wireless communication connection; the control module is used for receiving the detected data, calculating an angle value and a speed range according to the detected data, and transmitting the angle value and the speed range through a second wireless communication connection; and providing a remote cloud application server for receiving the angle value and the speed range through the second wireless communication connection, verifying a user, generating a data packet according to the angle value, the speed range and the verified user information, and transmitting the data packet to the display device.

column12: Data processing system and method capable of concealing files and folders
column13: A data processing system and a dataprocessing method are capable of concealing files and folders. The data processing system of the invention includes a data storage device and at least one processor. When an application process is started and executed by the at least one processor to search a designated folder of the data storage device through a storage device driver residing in a kernel mode of an operating system, a storage filter driver residing in the kernel mode of the operating system judges if there are files in the designated folder, and if any, the storage filter driver retrieves a next file in the designated folder through the storage device driver. If the storage filter driver determines that the application process is untrusted and determines that the next file is a concealed file, the storage filter driver does not return the next file.

column12: Carbon coin transaction system and method thereof
column13: The invention discloses a carbon currency transaction system and method, and the system consists of at least one authentication device connected with a device, at least one entity carbon currency and a transaction management host, and detects the energy consumption data of the device through a detection module of the authentication device. A carbon amount calculation module of an entity carbon coin can calculate a first carbon emission amount according to energy consumption data of equipment, the first carbon emission amount is uploaded to the transaction management host, the transaction management host further obtains an alternative announcement through an announcement calculation module, the announcement calculation module calculates a second carbon emission amount according to the alternative announcement, and the second carbon emission amount is uploaded to the transaction management host. Furthermore, an available valuable digital currency is calculated, and a carbon currency transaction event is generated and recorded.

column12: Method for verifying authenticity of product and establishing data of authorized product according to fabric characteristics by judging an image optical characteristic distribution message of an anti-counterfeit characteristic
column13: Provided is a method for verifying the authenticity of a product and establishing the data of an authorized product according to the fabric characteristics. According to this invention, by receiving a partial image of at least one fabric and performing image analysis on the partial image of the fabric, an image optical characteristic distribution message of an anti-counterfeit characteristic is judged, then, a serial number, generated by operating an input device, of the fabric is received, and whether the fabric is an authorized product is judged according to the serial number of the fabric or the image optical characteristic distribution message. In addition, according to this invention, a part with an anti-counterfeit characteristic woven on a fabric is shot to generate at least one to-be-analyzed fabric image, then, image analysis is performed based on the to-be-analyzed fabric image to generate an image optical distribution characteristic, the image optical distribution characteristic is recorded as an authentic product anti-counterfeit characteristic message, and the authentic product anti-counterfeit characteristic message is associated and stored with a serial number of an authentic fabric so as to generate the data of the authorized product.

column12: Debt repayment system and debt management method
column13: Provided are a debt repayment system and a debt management method. According to the method, a transaction through a purchase carrier is received, and the purchase amount of money is acquired. The purchase carrier includes a physical or virtual card for payment. A repayment plan with respect to first and second steps is determined depending on the purchase amount of money and the total debt. A first repayment in the repayment plan of the first step is related to repayment of interest without the principal with respect to the total debt and a second repayment in the repayment plan of the second step is related to repayment of interest with the principal with respect to the total debt. The repayment amount withdrawn from a repayment account is determined depending on the debt ratio of each credit bank. The repayment account is used to store the refund amount of the first or second repayment and the purchase amount of money. Therefore, debt can be more easily managed. To this end, the present invention comprises: a plurality of credit bank servers; a carrier providing server; at least one consumer terminal; an account management server; and a repayment distribution server.

column12: Asset rights management system based on blockchain and method thereof
column13: An asset rights management system based on blockchain and method thereof is disclosed. By deploying an asset smart contract of an asset on a blockchain network, and executing the asset smart contract to generate a plurality of fungible ownership tokens used to represent the ownership of the asset as well as to generate a plurality of corresponding and non-fungible use rights tokens used to represent the right to use of the asset, so as to transfer the use rights tokens and to calculate an amount of profit-sharing to send to owner when the asset smart contract receives a proceeds from transaction the use rights tokens. The mechanism is help to improve the convenience of rights management and income of the asset.

column12: Electronic fence and electronic fence alarm system
column13: The utility model discloses an electronic fence and an electronic fence alarm system. The electronic fence comprises a plurality of signal emitters, the plurality of signal emitters are arranged on the ground to define a fence area with boundaries, one of the plurality of signal emitters is arranged in the form of a floor lamp, and a hyperplane model for judging the interior and exterior of the fence area is stored in the floor lamp; signal receiver, the signal receiver is arranged on the moving tool; the signal receiver is used for receiving a transmitting signal of each signal transmitter inthe plurality of signal transmitters; transmitting a transmitting signal of each signal transmitter to an electronic license plate on the mobile tool; the electronic license plate is in wireless communication with the floor lamp so as to send the emission signal of each signal emitter to the floor lamp, and the floor lamp judges whether the mobile tool is located in the fence area or not according to the received emission signal of each signal emitter and the hyperplane model, so that the identification precision is high, the installation is simple, the maintenance is easy, and too much costis not consumed.
column14: XIAMEN HUAFANG SOFTWARE TECH CO LTD

column12: DATA EXCHANGE GROUP SYSTEM AND A METHOD THEREOF
column13: The present disclosure relates to a data exchange group system and a method thereof which features: a shared file is saved in a file storage space of a storage device via the internet and also recorded in an intrinsic file list of the storage device; the shared file is configured to be shared in the storage device and also recorded in a shared file list of the storage device; the shared file is configured to be queried in a transaction system and recorded in a group file list of the storage device; the shared file encrypted and authorized in the transaction system is received by a data recipient through an encrypted file connection for the shared file of the storage device.

column12: SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR AUTOMATIC GENERATION OF BOOKMARKS UTILIZING FOCUSED CONTENT ANALYSIS
column13: A computing device initiates a video desktop recording capturing activities on a desktop displayed on the computing device, wherein during the video desktop recording, the computing device is further configured to detect at least one window within the video desktop recording, and identify a target window from among the at least one window detected within the video desktop recording. The computing device is further configured to generate a bookmark comprising metadata associated with the target window responsive to identifying the target window, the metadata comprising a time stamp when the target window was identified. The computing device is further configured to store the bookmark as part of the video desktop recording.

column12: VERIFICATION SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR CHAINING DATA
column13: To provide a verification system and a method for chaining data.SOLUTION: In a verification system, a security protocol device integrates received record data into binary trees. Each binary tree includes a root and leaf nodes. The security protocol device transmits root hashes of the roots to a blockchain device at a blockchain. The blockchain device generates a chain data string including data sets chained in a series manner. Each data set includes a root hash and a corresponding chain hash. The chain hash of each data set is related to the root hash and the chain hash of the previous data set, and the chain hash of the first data set is related to an initial chain hash. The security protocol device stores the binary trees and the initial chain hash to an off-chain database device.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 8

column12: An artificial intelligence IP-pbx system with mobile value-added service
column13: An artificial intelligence IP-PBX system with mobile value-added services collaboratively operates a cloud server, an IP-PBX, and a master application (APP). The cloud server is provided with a payment module and a first registration module and provided to a user for uploading APP information edited by an APP developer and storing the APP information in a first database. The cloud server is used as an independent platform like the APP Store. The IP-PBX is provided with an AI mechanism that analyzes instant messages of users and performs a correlative comparison on the first database and a second database to calculate and show the list of optimal requirements. The master APP is installed in a host device and provided to the user for performing an instant messaging operation. The master APP uses a displaying unit to display the list of optimal requirements for utilization by users. The system can achieve diversified action function applications that interact with the user of IP-PBX.

column12: GAS DETECTING DEVICE
column13: A gas detecting device (100) includes a casing (1), at least one gas transporting actuator (2), at least one valve (3) and at least one external sensor (4). The casing (1) has an airflow chamber (11), an inlet (12), a branch channel (13) and a connection channel (14). The airflow chamber (11) communicates with an environment outside the casing (1) through the inlet (12), and the branch channel (13) communicates with the airflow chamber (11) and the connection channel (14). The gas transporting actuator (2) is disposed within the branch channel (13) for transporting air into the airflow chamber (11) and the branch channel (13) from the inlet (12), and has a nozzle plate (21), a chamber frame (22), an actuator (23), an insulation frame (24) and a conducting frame (25). The valve (3) is disposed between the connection channel (14) and the branch channel (13) for controlling the air to flow into the connection channel (14). The external sensor (4) is detachably disposed within the connection channel (14) and has a sensor for measuring the air in the connection channel (14).

column12: SEMANTIC PROCESSING METHOD, ELECTRONIC DEVICE, AND NON-TRANSITORY COMPUTER READABLE RECORDING MEDIUM
column13: A semantic processing method includes the following steps of: segmenting an input sentence into a plurality of lexicons according to a lexicon database, wherein the lexicon table includes a plurality of table blocks, and the table blocks are respectively located at a plurality of levels of the lexicon table; referring one part of speech or a plurality of parts of speech, corresponding to one of the lexicons of the table blocks, in the lexicon database; performing at least one grammar rule for each of the table blocks of the levels according to the part of speech, the plurality of parts of speech, the part of speech sequence or the plurality of part of speech sequences corresponding to the table blocks of the lexicon table; and outputting a parse tree according to the table blocks in the lexicon table that conform to the at least one grammar rule.

column12: A wake word recognition training system and training method thereof
column13: A wake word recognition training system and training method thereof includes: a sentence database stores plural sentences and corresponding phoneme sequences and voice signal; a phoneme disassembly module disassembles the externally input wake words to obtain the wake word phoneme sequence. The comparison module compares the sentence and its phoneme sequence based on the phoneme sequence of the wake word; the sentence classification module divides the sentences from the sentence database into wake-word-like part-of-speech sentences and non-wake-word-like part-of-speech sentences according to the comparison results of the phoneme comparison module; And the wake word training module imports a deep neural network model, and trains the deep neural network model based on the phoneme sequence of the wake-word part-of-speech sentence and the phoneme sequence of the non-wake-word part-of-speech sentence, and builds the wake-word recognition model.

column12: SHELF LIFE MONITORING SYSTEM
column13: A shelf life monitoring system for perishable products of different types comprises a low-temperature display cabinet, a point of sale terminal, and a server, connected through a network. During the storage, the server can determine whether the storage condition required for a perishable product is the same as the storage condition of the low-temperature display cabinet which the perishable product is stored. The server can further determine whether the low-temperature display cabinet is operating normally, and issue alerts as to potential reductions in shelf life of the perishable product when abnormal conditions occur. The server can also periodically check for any life-expired food and notify the point of sale terminal to identify and process a life-expired product in certain ways.

column12: Elevator dispatching system, device and method based on block chain system and storage medium
column13: An elevator dispatching method based on a block chain system comprises the steps that a value storage interface and a consumption interface are provided so that a passenger can use the value storage interface to conduct virtual currency value storage and use the consumption interface to initiate an elevator calling transaction; when the passenger initiates the elevator calling transaction, each node is controlled to verify the elevator calling transaction; when the elevator call transaction passes the verification of the nodes, verification passing messages are broadcasted to the block chain system; when the nodes receive the verification passing messages exceeding a first preset number, elevator calling consumption information of the passenger is saved; and when the elevator calling transaction succeeds, an elevator system controller is controlled to dispatch an elevator to the passenger as a special elevator for the passenger. The invention further provides an elevator dispatching system and device based on the block chain system and a computer-readable storage medium. According to the method, the exclusive elevator service can be purchased through block chain intelligent contract payment, and the waiting time of passenger is saved.

column12: DATA STORAGE DEVICE WITH AN EXCLUSIVE CHANNEL FOR FLAG CHECKING OF READ DATA, AND NON-VOLATILE MEMORY CONTROL METHOD
column13: A non-volatile memory control technology. In response to a read command, a non-volatile memory interface controller temporarily stores data read from a non-volatile memory to a system memory and, accordingly, asserts a flag in the system memory. Through a write channel provided by the interconnect bus, the host bridge controller confirms that the flag is asserted to correctly read the data from the system memory. A master computing unit reads the system memory through a read channel provided by the interconnect bus, without being delayed by the status checking of the flag. The host bridge controller executes a data detection command or a preset vendor command to issue a write request for programming data in a virtual address, to trigger a handshake between the host bridge controller and the system memory through the write channel. During the handshake, flag checking is achieved.

column12: ADVERTISING OPERATION SYSTEM, ADVERTISING OPERATION METHOD, AND READABLE STORAGE MEDIUM
column13: An advertising operation method applied to an electronic device is provided. The method includes receiving a public key allocated by a server which acts as a seller. A request signal for obtaining a first website address of a product is sent to the server. The first website address of the product is received from the server. An encrypted electronic wallet address is obtained by encrypting a preset electronic wallet address using the public key. A second website address of the product is generated based on the first website address of the product and the encrypted electronic wallet address. The product is prompted to a client using the second website address of the product; and bonus is obtained from the server using the preset electronic wallet address.

column12: Data query method, block chain system, sharing device and query device
column13: The invention provides a data query method, which comprises the following steps of: receiving query data from a query device, and verifying whether the query data is authorized or not; when the query data is authorized, obtaining shared data corresponding to the query data; logic judgment is conducted on the query data and the shared data corresponding to the query data to obtain a query result corresponding to the query data, and the query result is a preset logic judgment result; encrypting a query result corresponding to the query data; the encrypted query result is sent to the query device; and the query device decrypts the query result according to a decryption rule. The invention further provides a block chain system, a sharing device and a query device. According to the method, the user data can be automatically queried, and the safety and authenticity of the user data are guaranteed in the data query process.

column12: SEARCH METHOD AND ELECTRONIC DEVICE USING THE METHOD
column13: The instant disclosure provides a search method and an electronic device using the method. The search method includes: receiving an input string; determining whether the input string corresponds to apredetermined rule stored in the electronic device; if yes, analyzing the input string into at least a first key string and a second key string according to the predetermined rule; and initiating a searching of the second key string through the network according to a predetermined condition related to the first key string. The electronic device includes a rule module or storing or reading the predetermined rule and a search system for searching through a network by the search method.

column12: METHOD FOR AUTOMATICALLY GENERATING NEWS EVENTS OF A CERTAIN TOPIC AND ELECTRONIC DEVICE APPLYING THE SAME
column13: A method for automatically generating news event of a certain topic applied in an electronic device analyzes text of the news event by a topic model to obtain topics, a probability distribution of keywords in each topic is established, and a time interval distribution of the keywords in each topic is calculated. Keywords within a preset probability distribution range are selected to reduce the size of a word bag relating to the topic, and a time interval range of the reduced word bag of the topic is determined. A calculation of text similarities of the text in a database is made to obtain a news article corresponding to each topic according to the time interval range of the reduced word bag, and a title of the news article as a target topic of the text of the news event is determined.

column12: Electronic cigarette management system and method
column13: The invention provides an electronic cigarette management system, and the system comprises a cloud server, a processing device and an electronic cigarette. The cloud server is used for generating and transmitting suggestion information. The processing device is provided with a wireless unit, a use interface and a computing unit, the processing device is wirelessly connected with the cloud server through the wireless unit and receives the suggestion information, and the use interface receives user input; the calculation unit executes one of at least one calculation process according to the user input so as to generate and transmit electronic cigarette setting data. The electronic cigarette is provided with a communication module and a storage unit and is connected with the processing device through the communication module to receive electronic cigarette setting data, the storage unit is used for storing use data, and the electronic cigarette transmits the use data to the processing device, so that the use interface displays the use data. The processing device receives the usage data and transmits the usage data to the cloud server, so that the cloud server generates the suggestion information according to the usage data, wherein the suggestion information is used in at least one calculation process.

column12: GRANDING METHOD OF PHYSIOLOGICAL AND EMOTIONAL RESPONSE OF ELECTROENCEPHALOGRAPH (EEG)

column12: Method for processing multi-media signal, and associated multi-media device
Systeme und Verfahren zur Lokalisierung systematischer Fehler mittels physical failure analysis (PFA)
column13: Es werden Systeme und Verfahren zur Lokalisierung systematischer Fehler bereitgestellt, die eine rechnerische, GDS-unterstützte Navigation verwenden, um die physische Fehleranalyse zu beschleunigen und Positionen und Muster systematischer Fehler zu identifizieren. In einigen Ausführungsformen enthält ein Verfahren das Detektieren mehrerer elektrischer Fehlerregionen mehrerer Dies eines Halbleiterwafers. Es werden zerlegte Graphic Database System (GDS)-Crosslayer-Ausschnitte generiert, die mit den mehreren elektrischen Fehlerregionen verknüpft sind. Mehrere gemeinsame Crosslayer-Muster werden auf der Basis der zerlegten GDS-Crosslayer-Ausschnitte identifiziert. Normalisierte Differenziale können für jedes der gemeinsamen Crosslayer-Muster bestimmt werden, und Positionen von Wärmekonzentrationspunkten in jedem der Dies können auf der Basis der bestimmten normalisierten Differentiale identifiziert werden.

column12: Automatic website data collection method using a complex semantic computing model to form a seed vocabulary data set
column13: The invention relates to an automatic website data collection method, in which a hybrid web crawler strategy is used for obtaining a probability distribution of a web page label of one web page of a website to obtain important features of the website, and further capturing text content of the important features on the website, and using a complex semantic computing model to form a seed vocabulary data set. The seed vocabulary data set generates a thematic vocabulary data set having a high frequency and a high representative hierarchical structure, and further uses a visualization system to present the thematic vocabulary data set with the hierarchical structure.

column12: Virtual fitness competition method and sports device
column13: The present application provides a virtual fitness competition method, which is applied to sports devices. The virtual fitness competition method includes: collecting user data of each user; comparing the user data with a pre-defined data range; when the user data falls into a scope of the data range, sending the user data to a cloud server; receiving ranking information of all users sent by the cloud server; and displaying the ranking information. The present application can realize the competition and interaction of a bodybuilder during fitness and improve the bodybuilder's fitness desire and motivation.

column12: Method and system for trading of blockchain
column13: A method for trading of blockchain is provided. The method for trading of blockchain includes generating a trade request. The trade request includes an identify of an initiator of the trade, an identify of a receiver of the trade, an exchange of the trade, time of the trade, and a digital signature of the initiator of the trade. The method further includes transmitting the trade request to the receiver of the trade and verifying the trade request. If a verification is passed, the method signs a digital signature of the receiver of the trade on the trade request. The method further includes transferring the cash from the initiator of the trade to the receiver of the trade. A system for trading of blockchain is also provided. The method and the system are capable of preventing the receiver of the trade from colliding with malicious attack, for example a dust attack, or the like, and preventing admitting of the trade after finishing the trade.
column14: HON HAI PREC IND CO LTD

column12: Operation system based on membership level and method thereof
column13: An operation system based on membership level comprises a database, a computer device connected to the database, and a display device. The computer device receives member data 200 and sets the member data to a zeroth membership level. The computer device has an analysis module for searching in the database for a plurality of (N+1)th level sub-member data related to the N-th level sub-member data, and setting the (N+1)th-level sub-member data to (N+l)th membership level. For example, it searches for first level sub-member data 210-212 related to the zeroth level sub-member data 200 and sets the first level sub-member data to be the first membership level 305. The display device, using the member data 200 as a center, displays the member data 200, the first membership level 305, the second membership level 307 to the (N+1)th membership level. New member data can be classified into the (M+1)th membership level when the new member scans a code belonging to a member of the Mth membership level, i.e. a referral.

column12: Device and method for deleting file data and computer readable storage medium
column13: The invention provides an embodiment of a file data deleting device. The file data deleting device comprises a storage device; and a processing unit. The storage device is configured to store a plurality of file data sets in a sub-volume, each file data set being associated with one of a plurality of objects in a directory tree, and each object copying (Copy-On-Write COW) snapshots while referringto one or more first writes. The processing unit is used for calculating a release estimation value for a plurality of accumulated detection sets, wherein each accumulated detection set comprises oneor more second COW snapshot identifiers; deleting the third COW snapshot by referring to the release estimation value; and after the third COW snapshot is deleted, deleting the file data set which does not appear in the directory tree and is not protected by any COW snapshot. The embodiment has the advantages that the estimation deviation caused by individual estimation of the releasable space ofthe COW snapshot is avoided, and the deletion decision of the COW snapshot is not influenced due to the fact that the releasable space is generally underestimated.

column12: Data processing apparatus and data processing method for internet of things system
column13: A data processing apparatus and a data processing method thereof for an Internet of Things (IoT) system are provided. The data processing apparatus 1 generates a plurality of diagnosis rule data, diagnoses each of the device data received from at least one IoT apparatus 2a, 2b, 2c to generate a plurality of diagnosis log data, packages the device data, the diagnosis log data and thediagnosis rule data respectively based on a preset data amount to generate a plurality of device files, a plurality of diagnosis log files and a plurality of diagnosis rule files individually, and stores each device file, each diagnosis log file and each diagnosis rule file in an interplanetary file system 4 individually, and stores hash values of each device file, each diagnosis log file and each diagnosis rule file in a blockchain system 5 individually. Integrity of the data stored in the interplanetary file system can be verified by generating a hash value from the data retrieved from the interplanetary file system and comparing it with the corresponding has value stored in the blockchain system (e.g. to confirm they match). The device data comprises a time stamp, a device identifier and state information.

column12: Method for establishing and processing cross-language information and cross-language information system

column12: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR GENERATING DYNAMIC MAP INFORMATION CAPABLE OF PROVIDING ENVIRONMENT INFORMATION
column13: A method and a system for generating dynamic map information with environment information are provided, wherein the system includes a cloud server, multiple relay hosts distributed around the environment and multiple vehicle devices each installed respectively in different vehicles. Each vehicle device includes a LiDAR sensor and a camera for sensing the environment to respectively generate point cloud data and image data. When the point cloud data from different vehicles are transmitted to a neighboring relay host, the relay host performs a multi-vehicle data integration mode to merge the point cloud data and obtain 3D coordinates information of objects in the environment according to the merged data. Based on the 3D coordinates information of objects, the cloud server generates and transmits dynamic map information to the vehicles. By sharing sensing data of different vehicles, the sensing area of each vehicle is expanded to mitigate dark zones or blind zones.

column12: NAVIGATION METHOD AND NAVIGATION SYSTEM IMPLEMENTING THE SAME
column13: To provide a navigation system capable of performing navigation for a navigation device based on a real-time position of another navigation device.SOLUTION: A navigation method is implemented by a group of portable devices 6a, 6b, 6c, each being associated with a map information system 71 and communicatively coupled to a respective instrument cluster device 5a, 5b, 5c of a respective vehicle 1a, 1b, 1c. The group of the portable devices 6a, 6b, 6c includes a leader device 6a and at least one follower device 6b, 6c. The map information system 71 computes a dynamic navigation path from the follower device 6b, 6c to the leader device 6a for the follower device 6b, 6c. An instrument cluster device of a vehicle corresponding to the follower device 6a, 6b perceivably outputs the dynamic navigation path.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 2

column12: METHOD AND APPARATUS OF CLOUD DATA PRIVACY MANAGEMENT SYSTEM
column13: In a method and apparatus of cloud data privacy management system, the method includes steps of: using an information capture unit to capture and provide at least one biometric data and identification data of at least one human body at a first time by a user; receiving the human biometric data and identification data and calculating the human biometric data of the first time to create at least one algorithm result data for later identifying the human biometric data of the first time by a calculation unit; detecting the reliability of the algorithm result data and providing the algorithm result data by a crawler detection unit; receiving and storing the algorithm result data and then deleting the human biometric data from the calculation unit by an information collection center.

column12: DEVICE FOR DISPATCHING ELEVATOR, METHOD, AND ELEVATOR-DISPATCHING SYSTEM UTILIZING BLOCK CHAIN
column13: A method for dispatching an elevator applied in a block chain system verifies a call for an elevator by a passenger. The method includes: controlling each node of the block chain system to verify the elevator call; broadcasting information to the block chain system as to verification granted when verification of the elevator call by a node is passed; saving consumption information of the elevator call when the quantity of verifications granted received by the node is greater than a first predetermined value; and controlling and dispatching an elevator to be at the service of the passenger as a dedicated elevator when the elevator call is successful. A device for dispatching elevators when called and a system are also provided.

column12: DISPLAY APPARATUS AND METHOD FOR OPTIMIZING DISPLAY MODE
column13: A display apparatus and method for optimizing a display mode are provided. The display apparatus and method for optimizing a display mode include a display, a memory and a processor. The memory includes a sampling module, a neural network module and a mode selection module. The display displays an image data stream and has display modes. The sampling module samples the image data stream in a first time interval to generate sampling data in response to a trigger signal. The neural network module classifies the sampling data through the neural network to generate a classification outcome corresponding to the display modes. The mode selection module selects one of the display modes according to the classification outcome to display the image data stream.

column12: METHOD AND APPARATUS OF CLOUD DATA PRIVACY MANAGEMENT SYSTEM
column13: In a method and apparatus of cloud data privacy management system, the method includes steps of: using an information capture unit to capture and provide at least one biometric data and identification data of at least one human body at a first time by a user; receiving the human biometric data and identification data and calculating the human biometric data of the first time to create at least one algorithm result data for later identifying the human biometric data of the first time by a calculation unit; detecting the reliability of the algorithm result data and providing the algorithm result data by a crawler detection unit; receiving and storing the algorithm result data and then deleting the human biometric data from the calculation unit by an information collection center.

column12: Fault tolerance method and system for virtual machine group
column13: A fault tolerance method and system for a virtual machine group is proposed. The method includes: establishing fault tolerance backup connections of virtual machines between a virtual machine hypervisor of at least one primary host and a virtual machine hypervisor of at least one backup host to perform fault tolerance backups of the virtual machines, wherein the plurality of virtual machines are included in a fault tolerance group; when a synchronizer determines that a failover of at least one first virtual machine among the primary virtual machines in the fault tolerance group is being performed. Informing, by the synchronizer, to perform a failover of other remaining primary virtual machines among the primary virtual machines in the fault tolerance group, or to return other remaining primary virtual machines among the primary virtual machines in the fault tolerance group back to a last fault tolerance backup state of each and continue performing fault tolerance backups of the other remaining primary virtual machines.

column12: 异常流量检测方法与异常流量检测装置
column13: 本发明的实施例提供一种异常流量检测方法，其包括：获得目标装置的网络流量数据；根据取样窗取样所述网络流量数据以获得取样数据。所述取样窗具有一时间长度；根据所述取样数据产生图像。所述图像呈现所述网络流量数据相对于所述时间长度的流量特征；以及分析所述图像以产生对应异常流量的评估信息。此外，本发明的实施例也提供一种异常流量检测装置，可有效提高对于异常流量和/或恶意程序的检测和/或分析能力。

column12: AUTHENTICATION AND APPROVAL METHOD AND AUTHENTICATION SERVER
column13: To provide an authentication and approval method and an authentication server which allow log-in to a plurality of application programs by using a set of login information to reduce burdens for a user to memorize login information.SOLUTION: A method receives log-in information from an application program, generates a user token in response to a fact that it is authenticated that the log-in information is legal, returns the user token to the application program, receives a request for calling an application program interface, generates an application program token in response to a fact that it is authenticated that the user token, etc. are legal, returns the application program token to the application program, and approves that the application program calls the application program interface.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 2

column12: ELECTRONIC DEVICE AND METHOD FOR TURNOVER RATE PREDICTION
column13: An electronic device and a method for turnover rate prediction are provided, wherein the method includes: receiving human resource (HR) data; generating a feature dataset according to the HR data; inputting a first subset of the feature dataset to a first machine learning model to generate a first prediction; inputting a second subset of the feature dataset to a second machine learning model to generate a second prediction; and inputting the first prediction, the second prediction, and a third subset of the feature dataset to a third machine learning model to generate a first turnover rate prediction.

column12: AUTONOMOUS VEHICLE SEMANTIC MAP ESTABLISHMENT SYSTEM AND ESTABLISHMENT METHOD
column13: The disclosure provides an autonomous vehicle semantic map establishment system and an autonomous vehicle semantic map establishment method. The autonomous vehicle semantic map establishment system includes an image capturing module, a positioning module, a memory, and a processor. The image capturing module acquires a current road image. The positioning module acquires positioning data corresponding to the current road image. The memory stores three-dimensional (3D) map data. The 3D map data includes multiple point cloud data. The processor accesses the memory. The processor analyzes the current road image, to identify object information of a specific traffic object in the current road image. The processor marks, according to the positioning data, the object information of the specific object onto a plurality of corresponding points in the multiple point cloud data corresponding to the specific object in the 3D map data.

column12: MACHINING PARAMETER AUTOMATIC GENERATION SYSTEM
column13: A machining parameter automatic generation system includes a geometric data capturing module, a feature recognition learning network and a machining parameter learning network. The geometric data capturing module captures a geometric shape of a workpiece to generate a candidate feature list. The feature recognition learning network trains the candidate feature list according to a first neural network model to obtain an applicable feature list. The machining parameter learning network trains the applicable feature list and the candidate machining parameter according to a second neural network model to obtain an applicable machining parameter. The applicable machining parameter is used to generate a machining program, and the machining program is read by a machine tool for processing.
